Question:
あの後のスーパーでも同じやり取り。
気まずくてしばらくあの商店街に行けないぞ。
……まぁネコの可愛いところと言われればそうなんだけども。
[バニラ]: 「ん？　くんくん、くんくん……」
[バニラ]: 「あっちからすごくいい匂いがする」
[ショコラ]: 「ほんとだ、すごく香ばしくていい匂いがしますご主人さま！」
[嘉祥]: 「確かに。この匂いは……」
匂いのする方角へと顔を向ける。
[屋台のネコ]: 「いらっしゃいませー！」
[屋台のネコ]: 「おいしいできたてのたこやき、いかがですかー！」
[屋台のネコ]: 「あっつあつで、かつおぶしたっぷりのたこやき、いかがですかー！」
[ショコラ]: 「わぁ、ネコのたこ焼き屋さんだ！　珍しいですね、ご主人さま！」
reference_answer:
After that, it was the same sort of exchange at the supermarket.
The whole thing was so awkward that I don't think I can visit that shopping district for a while.
... Well, I guess you could say that was the cute side of catgirls.
[Vanilla]: 「Hmm? Sniff sniff, sniff sniff...」
[Vanilla]: 「Something smells really nice over there.」
[Chocola]: 「You're right! Something smells really good, Master!」
[Kashou]: 「It definitely does. What is this smell...」
I turned towards the source of it.
[Food Stand Cat]: 「Welcome~!」
[Food Stand Cat]: 「Would you like to try some delicious, fresh takoyaki~?」
[Food Stand Cat]: 「Would you like to try some piping hot takoyaki with lots of bonito flakes on top~?」
[Chocola]: 「Wah, it's a takoyaki shop run by a catgirl! That's pretty rare, huh, Master?!」
ModelAnswer:
The same exchange happened at the supermarket afterward. I'm going to avoid that shopping district for a while because it's too awkward. ...Well, if you say cats are cute, then I guess they are.  

[Vanilla]: "Hmm? Sniff sniff..."  
[Vanilla]: "There's an amazing smell coming from over there!"  
[Chocola]: "You're right! It smells so fragrant and delicious, Master!"  
[Kashou]: "Indeed. That scent is..."  

He turns his face toward the source of the aroma.  

[Stall Cat]: "Welcome!"  
[Stall Cat]: "Freshly made takoyaki—would you like some?"  
[Stall Cat]: "Hot and packed with bonito flakes—how about it?"  
[Chocola]: "Wow, a cat's takoyaki stall! That's rare, Master!"

Question:
[ショコラ]: 「いい子になれるようにって！」
[バニラ]: 「時雨、厳しい。でもお陰様で色々と覚えた」
[店主]: 「そうなんだ？　良いご主人様なのね」
[ショコラ]: 「あ、でもご主人さまはご主人さまなんです！」
[ショコラ]: 「時雨ちゃんは時雨ちゃんですから！　ね、ご主人さま？」
[バニラ]: 「通訳すると、時雨は大事な友達」
[バニラ]: 「ご主人って呼ぶのはこっちのご主人だけってことで」
[店主]: 「あはは。愛されてるんだね、ご主人さまは？」
[嘉祥]: 「まぁ、ありがたいことに」
肘で軽く小突かれる。
照れくさいような苦笑いで返事を返す。
……外だと流石にちょっと照れくさい。
reference_answer:
[Chocola]: 「She said we'd grow up to be good catgirls if we listened to her!」
[Vanilla]: 「Shigure was tough on us. But thanks to her, we learned a lot.」
[Food Stand Owner]: 「Really? What a wonderful owner you have.」
[Chocola]: 「Ah, but Master is Master!」
[Chocola]: 「And Shigure-chan is Shigure-chan! Right, Master?」
[Vanilla]: 「In other words, Shigure is an important friend.」
[Vanilla]: 「And when we say 'Master,' we are referring to Master over here.」
[Food Stand Owner]: 「Ahaha! You're a very well-loved "master," aren't you?」
[Kashou]: 「Well, I am grateful.」
She lightly nudged me with her elbow.
I responded with an embarrassed, forced smile.
... Hearing this kind of stuff in public sure was embarrassing.
ModelAnswer:
**Chocola:** "So we can be good girls!"
**Vanilla:** "Shigure, you're harsh. But thanks to you, I learned a lot."
**Shopkeeper:** "Is that so? You have a good Master, then."
**Chocola:** "Ah, but our Master is *our* Master!"
**Chocola:** "And Shigure-chan is Shigure-chan! Right, Master?"
**Vanilla:** "To translate: Shigure is an important friend. Calling someone 'Master' only applies to this one."
**Shopkeeper:** "Haha. You're really loved, aren't you, Master?"
**Kashou:** "Well, I'm grateful for it."
He's lightly nudged in the elbow.
He replies with a slightly embarrassed, wry smile.
...It's still a little embarrassing outside, though.

metadata: [character] Name: Minaduki Kashou (水無月 嘉祥) | Gender: Male | Aliases: Master (ご主人さま)
Question:
ハキハキとした笑顔で伝票とペンを差し出される。
[嘉祥]: 「そうですね、えっと……」
受け取った伝票を改めて確認する。
[嘉祥]: 「……どうも、自分が頼んだものと違うみたいなんですけども」
[食器業者]: 「……え、本当ですか？」
[食器業者]: 「それは、品物が違う……ということでしょうか？」
[嘉祥]: 「いえ、頼んだものも確かに入ってるみたいなのですが……」
店内に積まれたダンボールへと視線を向ける。
小さな店内に積まれたダンボールの山、山、山。
むしろ店内がほぼダンボールになっていた。
[嘉祥]: 「見ての通り、ウチではこんなにたくさんの食器は必要ないので……」
[食器業者]: 「す、すみません！　すぐに本社に確認しますので！」
[食器業者]: 「少々お待ち頂いてもよろしいでしょうか！？」
reference_answer:
She smiled brightly and brought out the invoice along with a pen.
[Kashou]: 「Okay, let's see...」
I looked over the sales invoice I received once more.
[Kashou]: 「... Somehow, this doesn't look like what I ordered.」
[Tableware Seller]: 「... Huh, is that so?」
[Tableware Seller]: 「Are you saying that these... aren't the correct items?」
[Kashou]: 「No, the stuff I ordered is in here too, but...」
I looked over at the pile of boxes inside the bakery.
Inside of my tiny bakery was a mountain of boxes. A MOUNTAIN.
It was as if the inside of the bakery had become completely made of boxes.
[Kashou]: 「As you can see, we don't need this much tableware inside the bakery...」
[Tableware Seller]: 「I-I'm sorry! I'll check with the main office right away!」
[Tableware Seller]: 「Could you give me a few moments?」
ModelAnswer:
**Kashou:** "Yes, um..."
He takes the receipt and pen, examining it again.
**Kashou:** "...It seems like what I ordered isn't quite right."
**Dishware Supplier:** "...Eh? Really?"
**Dishware Supplier:** "Does that mean...the items are different?"
**Kashou:** "Well, everything I ordered *is* here, but..."
He glances at the stacks of cardboard boxes piled up inside the store.
Mountains and mountains of cardboard boxes crammed into the small space. The store is practically overflowing with them.
**Kashou:** "As you can see, we don't need this many dishes."
**Dishware Supplier:** "S-Sorry! I'll confirm with headquarters right away!"
**Dishware Supplier:** "Would you mind waiting a moment?"

metadata: [character] Name: Minaduki Kashou (水無月 嘉祥) | Gender: Male | Aliases: Master (ご主人さま)
Question:
[食器業者]: 「こちらのミスで、別の注文書と混じってしまっていたようでして……」
[食器業者]: 「水無月様の方もすぐにご入用と思いますので……」
[食器業者]: 「もしよろしければ、ご注文分の食器を受け取って頂ければと思うのですが……」
[嘉祥]: 「注文分を受け取れって……」
[嘉祥]: 「……え？　この中からですか？」
そびえ立つダンボールの山。
思わず言葉に詰まる。
どれも一様に同じ箱なわけで。
中身を開けてみるまで何が入っているのか分からない。
しかも伝票を見ればどれも最高級のティーセットや食器。
なので、扱いにも細心の注意を払わないととんでもないことになる。
[嘉祥]: 「あの、確かに開店準備もあるので今日もらえたら嬉しいですけども……」
[嘉祥]: 「……今からこれを全部って、相当時間かかりますよね？」
reference_answer:
[Tableware Seller]: 「Because of an error on our part, it appears that another order got mixed in with yours...」
[Tableware Seller]: 「I imagine that you may be in need of these items right away, Mr. Minaduki...」
[Tableware Seller]: 「So if at all possible, if you would be able to accept this order...」
[Kashou]: 「Accept this order...」
[Kashou]: 「... Huh? From all this?」
The mountain of cardboard boxes towered over everything.
I was at a loss for words.
Every box was of equal size.
I wouldn't know what was inside each of them without opening them up.
On top of that, looking at the sales invoice, I could see that they all contained expensive tea sets and tableware.
And if I accepted it all, it would be a lot of work to deal with all the new items.
[Kashou]: 「Uhm, there's still things that need doing in advance of my bakery's opening, so I don't mind accepting these...」
[Kashou]: 「... but it's going to take a while to deal with all of this.」
ModelAnswer:
**Dishware Merchant:** "It seems there was a mistake on our end, and your order got mixed up with another..."
**Dishware Merchant:** "We believe Mr. Minaduki will need these immediately as well..."
**Dishware Merchant:** "If it's alright with you, we were hoping you could take delivery of the ordered dishware..."
**Kashou:** "Take delivery of the order...?"
**Kashou:** "...Huh? From all of this?"
A towering mountain of cardboard boxes looms before him.
He's momentarily at a loss for words.
They're all identical boxes, after all.
You can't tell what's inside until you open them.
And judging by the invoices, they're all top-of-the-line tea sets and dishware.
So he has to be extremely careful how he handles them, or disaster could strike.

**Kashou:** "Well, I certainly would appreciate getting it today since we're preparing for the grand opening..."
**Kashou:** "...But taking all of this right now would take quite a while, wouldn't it?"

Question:
[嘉祥]: 「……ネコくらい単純に生きられれば、色々と楽なんだろうけどな」
窓に貼られている店の名前に目を向けながら。
苦笑いを振り払って、届いたばかりのティーセットを片付け始めた。
[バニラ]: 「あれ、今日はあのたこ焼き屋がいない」
昨日と同じ夕方の公園通り。
でも今日は屋台は見当たらない。
ネコたちを実家に送ろうにも今日に限って誰もおらず。
俺も実家の鍵は置いて来てしまっていた。
だから時雨が帰宅するまで時間調整で買い物へ。
[ショコラ]: 「……え？　あ、ご、ごめんバニラ！」
[ショコラ]: 「何だっけ、マタタビだっけ？」
[バニラ]: 「だいたいそんな感じ」
reference_answer:
[Kashou]: 「... It must be pretty nice to live the simple life of a catgirl, huh?」
I pondered as I looked at the name of the bakery affixed to the window.
With a bitter smile, I began to clean up the tea sets that had arrived earlier.
[Vanilla]: 「Huh, that takoyaki seller isn't here today.」
Just like yesterday, we took a walk through the park in the evening.
However, that food stand was nowhere to be found.
It just so happened that no one was home on the day I decided to take the two catgirls home.
I had also happened to leave the house key behind.
So to make good use of time, I went to do some shopping before Shigure got home.
[Chocola]: 「... Eh? Ah, s-sorry, Vanilla!」
[Chocola]: 「What was it called... catnip?」
[Vanilla]: 「That sounds about right.」
ModelAnswer:
**Kashou:** "……If only we could live as simply as cats, things would be easier in so many ways."  

He glanced at the store name stuck on the window. Shaking off a wry smile, he began clearing away the newly delivered tea set.  

**Vanilla:** "Huh? That takoyaki stand isn’t here today."  

The same evening park street as yesterday. But no stalls were in sight. Even though I wanted to send the cats home, of all days, no one’s around. And I left my house keys behind too. So, until Shigure gets back, I’m killing time with errands.  

**Chocola:** "...Eh? Ah, s-sorry, Vanilla!"  

**Chocola:** "What was it again… matatabi?"  

**Vanilla:** "Something like that."

metadata:

Question:
[嘉祥]: 「ショコラ、疲れたなら少し休んでくか？」
[ショコラ]: 「あ、はい、少しだけ……」
[ショコラ]: 「でも大丈夫ですから。心配かけてごめんなさい、ご主人さま」
[嘉祥]: 「……別に謝ることじゃないだろ」
困ったような笑顔で頭を下げる。
元気がない理由なんか分かり切ってるから。
だから何も言わずにいるしかない。
[嘉祥]: 「じゃあちょうどそこにベンチがあるし、少し休んでくか」
[バニラ]: 「じゃあ私、何か飲み物買ってくる」
[嘉祥]: 「ああ、頼む。全員分な」
[バニラ]: 「了解。任された」
バニラに小銭を渡してショコラをベンチに促す。
よく吹き抜ける潮風が公園の木々をざわめかせる。
reference_answer:
[Kashou]: 「Chocola, if you're tired, why don't we rest a bit?」
[Chocola]: 「Ah, okay. Maybe a little bit...」
[Chocola]: 「... Ah, no, Chocola is fine. Sorry to worry you, Master.」
[Kashou]: 「... There's no need for you to apologize.」
She had a troubled smile on her face as she nodded.
It was pretty clear why she wasn't in good spirits.
That's why there was nothing I could really say to her.
[Kashou]: 「Well, there happens to be a bench over there, so why don't we rest a bit?」
[Vanilla]: 「In that case, I will go buy something to drink.」
[Kashou]: 「Ahh, thanks. Something for everyone, okay?」
[Vanilla]: 「Understood. Leave it to me.」
I handed Vanilla some change and offered the bench to Chocola.
The constant sea breeze rustled the trees in the park.
ModelAnswer:
**Kashou:** "Chocola, if you're tired, why don't you rest for a bit?"
**Chocola:** "Ah, yes, just a little…"
**Chocola:** "But I'm alright. Sorry for worrying you, Master."
**Kashou:** "...You don't need to apologize."
He gives a troubled smile and bows his head.
He already knows the reason why she's not feeling well.
That's why he can only stay silent.
**Kashou:** "Well then, there's a bench right over there. Let's rest for a bit."
**Vanilla:** "Then I'll go buy some drinks."
**Kashou:** "Yeah, please do. For everyone."
**Vanilla:** "Got it. Leave it to me."
He hands Vanilla some change and guides Chocola towards the bench.
The strong sea breeze rustles the trees in the park.

Even if the road ahead of us is uncertain...

[Chocola]: 「Eh? Why is that? Aren't you done with shopping already?」

**Kashou:** "...Did you guys eat stuff like that all the time when you were at your old place?"
While feeling a little uneasy about where this was heading, he affectionately ruffled their heads.
**Kashou:** "Alright, let's head back to the shopping street then."

I reached for the business cards that had just arrived that morning.

She knew about protecting personal information, but not about business cards...?

He reaches for the shop card that arrived this morning.

Well, it would be a pain if we got weird sales calls or something.

She sat up straight and stared at me intensely.

Seeing her persistence, I decided to give in and surrendered with a sigh.
[Kashou]: 「... It's because I thought that I had to work harder.」
I murmured, leaning my head back on the pillow and looking at the ceiling.

[Kashou]: 「... It was then that it struck me.」

She straightened her posture, fixing me with a serious gaze.

Overwhelmed by her intensity, I sighed and gave in.

**Kashou:** "...It's because I wanted to do my best."
He rested his head on the pillow, murmuring toward the ceiling.

**Kashou:** "That's when it hit me."

そんなところも昔からの時雨らしさだ。
[時雨]: 「兄さまの仰ることも分かりますが」
[時雨]: 「でもネコは賢い子たちですから。人間の家族にも、パートナーにもなれるくらいに」
[時雨]: 「……だからこそ」
そこで一呼吸を置いて。
困ったような笑顔を浮かべて俺を見る。
[時雨]: 「……自分にも頼ってもらえないのは、きっと寂しいことだと思いますよ？」
その笑顔に胸がズキリと痛む。
reference_answer:
[Kashou]: 「Well, it's your own fault our clientele increased so much.」
[Shigure]: 「Oh? Just what might you be talking about?」
I decided not to press further.
Shigure smiled slightly and tilted her head in response.
If she was going to address that issue honestly, she would already have done so by now.
That's how Shigure had always been.
[Shigure]: 「I understand what you are saying, Nii-sama...」
[Shigure]: 「... but catgirls are clever. Clever enough to become family, and even lovers, to humans.」
[Shigure]: 「... And that's exactly why.」
She took a deep breath...
... and looked at me with a kind of troubled smile.
[Shigure]: 「... I think there would be a feeling of sadness to not be relied upon.」
Her smile stabbed at my heart.
ModelAnswer:
**Kashou:** "Thanks to Shigure, we've had more customers than expected."  
**Shigure:** "Oh? And what might you be referring to?"  

Since I decided not to press further,  
Shigure chuckled softly and tilted her head in response.  
If she were going to answer honestly, she would have said it directly.  
That’s just like Shigure, even from way back when.  

**Shigure:** "I understand what you mean, Brother."  
**Shigure:** "But cats are clever creatures—they can become part of a human family or even their partner."  
**Shigure:** "...Which is precisely why..."  

She paused for a breath.  
A troubled yet smiling look crossed her face as she gazed at me.  
**Shigure:** "...I think it must be lonely not being relied upon, don’t you?"  

My chest ached at that smile.

metadata:
[character] Name: Minaduki Shigure (水無月 時雨) | Gender: Female
[character] Name: Minaduki Kashou (水無月 嘉祥) | Gender: Male | Aliases: Master (ご主人さま)
Question:
携帯の画面を見て眉根を寄せる。
そのまま動かない時雨を見て着信元を察する。
[嘉祥]: 「実家からだろ？　早く出ないと」
[時雨]: 「……用件など出ずとも分かります。行き先を告げずに出て来たので」
時雨の手の中の携帯が鳴り止む。
同じように時雨も黙ったまま、
携帯をぎゅっと握り締める。
[時雨]: 「……私がまだ年端もいかぬ女だからですか？」
[時雨]: 「それとも、世間知らずの子どもだからですか？」
[時雨]: 「……だから、私はお父さまとお母さまの言うことに従わねばならないのでしょうか」
[時雨]: 「……私は、ここにいたいのです」
[時雨]: 「兄さまが苦しまれてる時くらい……せめて、お傍にいるだけでも……」
reference_answer:
She looked at her phone and furrowed her brows.
When Shigure just sat there motionlessly, I could pretty much figure out who it was.
[Kashou]: 「It's from home, right? You should answer.」
[Shigure]: 「... I don't need to answer to know what they want. I left without saying where I was going.」
The cell phone in Shigure's hand stopped ringing.
Shigure fell silent...
... and gripped the cell phone tightly.
[Shigure]: 「... Is it because I'm still a young girl?」
[Shigure]: 「... Or is it because I'm naïve to the world?」
[Shigure]: 「... Is that why I must do what mother and father ask of me?」
[Shigure]: 「... I want to be here.」
[Shigure]: 「When Nii-sama is suffering... at the very least, let me be by his side...」
ModelAnswer:
Shigure frowns as she looks at her phone screen. Observing Shigure's immobility, Kashou deduces the caller.

[Kashou]: "It's from your family, isn't it? You should answer it soon."

[Shigure]: "...I can guess the reason without even hearing it. I left without telling them where I was going, after all."

The phone in Shigure's hand stops ringing.

Silently, she clutches her phone tightly.

[Shigure]: "...Is it because I'm still a young girl?"

[Shigure]: "Or is it because I'm an innocent child who doesn't understand the world?"

[Shigure]: "...So, am I supposed to obey Father and Mother's every word?"

[Shigure]: "...I want to stay here."

[Shigure]: "Especially when my brother is suffering... at least, just being by his side..."

---

**SPEAKER FORMAT ADHERENCE:**
- All dialogue follows the `NAME: "DIALOGUE"` format.
- No commentary or unnecessary additions were included.
- Honorifics (e.g., "Father," "Mother") and onomatopoeia are preserved as per Japanese text.

[character] Name: Vanilla (バニラ) | Gender: Female
[character] Name: Chocola (ショコラ) | Gender: Female
[element] Name: Bell (鈴) | Type: Accessory
Question:
[バニラ]: 「他の病院の場所は知らないし……道を聞ける人も、歩いてない……」
[バニラ]: 「でも、このまま帰るわけにも行かないし……どうしたら……」
不安でぎゅっと手を握り合う。
冷たいシャッターを見上げて下唇をきゅっと噛む。
[警察]: 「キミたち、何してるの？」
[ショコラ]: 「あ……警察さん！」
[ショコラ]: 「開いてる病院教えてもらえませんか！？」
[ショコラ]: 「ご主人さまが大変で！　それで、お医者さん呼ぼうと思って！」
[バニラ]: 「病院が休みで、どうすればいいか分からなくて……」
[警察]: 「飼い主さんが？　それは大変だけど……」
[警察]: 「キミたち鈴は？　持ってないの？」
[ショコラ＆バニラ]: 「あっ……！」
指摘されて首元に手を当てる。
reference_answer:
[Vanilla]: 「We don't know any other clinics... and there aren't any people on the street to ask.」
[Vanilla]: 「We can't just go back like this... What should we...」
We gripped each other's hands tightly in worry.
Looking up at the cold shutters, we chewed our lips in concern.
[Police Officer]: 「What are you two doing there?」
[Chocola]: 「Ah... Ms. Policewoman!」
[Chocola]: 「Where's the closest open clinic?!」
[Chocola]: 「Master is in trouble, so we wanted to get a doctor!」
[Vanilla]: 「The clinic is closed and we don't know what to do...」
[Police Officer]: 「Your Master is? That's a quite a problem, but...」
[Police Officer]: 「Where are your Bells? Don't you have them?」
[Chocola&Vanilla]: 「Ah...!」
We touched our necks where she pointed.
ModelAnswer:
**Vanilla:** "I don't know any other hospitals… and there's no one around to ask for directions…"
**Vanilla:** "But I can't just go home like this… what should I do…?"
She clutches her hands together, anxiety welling up inside.
She bites her lower lip, gazing up at the cold shutters.
**Police Officer:** "What are you two doing here?"
**Chocola:** "Ah… Police Officer!"
**Chocola:** "Could you tell us where we can find an open hospital!?"
**Chocola:** "Our Master is in trouble! We were trying to call a doctor!"
**Vanilla:** "The hospital's closed, and I don't know what to do…"
**Police Officer:** "Your owner? That's serious, but…"
**Police Officer:** "Do you girls have your Bells on?"
**Chocola & Vanilla:** "Ah…!"
They instinctively reach for their necks.

[character] Name: Minaduki Shigure (水無月 時雨) | Gender: Female
[character] Name: Minaduki Kashou (水無月 嘉祥) | Gender: Male | Aliases: Master (ご主人さま)
Question:
朝イチから予想外の光景に頭がついて来てくれない。
[時雨]: 「おはようございます、兄さま」
[時雨]: 「私は今回の一件で色々と考えたのです」
晴れ晴れとした曇りの無い笑顔。
他のネコたちも同じように笑顔を俺に向けている。
つう、と冷たい汗が伝うのを感じながら、
[嘉祥]: 「はぁ……考えたって、何を……？」
何とかそれだけを口にする。
[時雨]: 「今回の一件で、兄さまに無理をするなというのが無理なことがよく分かりました」
[時雨]: 「ですが、私も妹として夜も眠れぬほど心配をさせられたのもまた事実……」
[時雨]: 「ならば人員を増やして、兄さまの負担を減らすのが一番の得策と、時雨は考えたのです」
[嘉祥]: 「…………はぁ」
reference_answer:
The first thing I saw this morning was so unexpected, my brain couldn't process it all.
[Shigure]: 「Good morning, Nii-sama.」
[Shigure]: 「This recent incident has gotten me thinking...」
She wore a sunny smile that no cloud could cover up.
The catgirls looked at me with similar smiles.
I felt myself break out in a cold sweat...
[Kashou]: 「Haah... thinking... about what...?」
I only managed to get out that much.
[Shigure]: 「After that incident, I learned that there's no way to keep Nii-sama from attempting to achieve the impossible.」
[Shigure]: 「However, it's also a fact that his dear little sister -- namely me -- is losing sleep from worrying about him so much.」
[Shigure]: 「Then, I thought that maybe having more workers would lessen Nii-sama's burden. That was the best plan.」
[Kashou]: 「...... Huh.」
ModelAnswer:
From the very start, my head can't keep up with this unexpected sight.
**Shigure:** "Good morning, Brother."
**Shigure:** "I've been doing a lot of thinking about everything that's happened."
A clear, cloudless smile.
The other cats are also smiling at me in the same way.
Feeling a cold sweat trickle down my back,
**Kashou:** "...Haa... Thinking about what...?"
I somehow manage to get those words out.
**Shigure:** "Through this whole incident, I realized that telling you not to push yourself is impossible."
**Shigure:** "However, it's also true that as your little sister, I was so worried I couldn't sleep at night..."
**Shigure:** "Therefore, Shigure concluded that the best course of action would be to increase personnel and reduce your burden, Master."
**Kashou:** "............Haa."

reference_answer:
[Shigure]: 「No need to worry, Nii-sama.」
[Shigure]: 「If it's for Nii-sama, I don't need any pay.」
[Kashou]: 「No no no no.」
[Kashou]: 「You have a curfew, and on weekdays, you have school...!」
[Shigure]: 「Yes, that's why it's not just me. The catgirls will be helping, too.」
Shigure turned towards them all.

[Maple]: 「I guess it can't be helped, then. At least Shigure will give me some allowance, right?」
[Azuki]: 「Geez. It's a pain in the butt, but that's the life of an owned catgirl, I guess.」
ModelAnswer:
**Shigure:** "There's no need to worry, Brother."
**Shigure:** "For your sake, Master, I don't require any payment."
**Kashou:** "No, no, no, no."
**Kashou:** "Because you have a curfew and school on weekdays…"
**Shigure:** "Yes. That's why the cats are helping me, not just me alone."
Shigure turns to face the cats.
**Coconut:** "For Master Kashou, and at Shigure-sama's command."
**Maple:** "Guess I have no choice; Shigure will pay us pocket money, right?"
**Azuki:** "Seriously. It's a pain, but I can't ignore my owner's request."

Question:

reference_answer:
[Vanilla]: 「Nice timing. You're always so on point, Master.」
[Kashou]: 「Vanilla, did you have a chat with those customers? They have some pretty happy smiles on their faces.」
[Vanilla]: 「...Mm.」
[Vanilla]: 「They said that me and Chocola get along really well.」
[Kashou]: 「Hahah... Guess they can pick up on that just from one look.」
[Vanilla]: 「Tee hee...」
[Chocola]: 「Meow! Master and Vanilla are having a fun conversation without Chocola!」
[Chocola]: 「You should let Chocola join in, too!」
[Vanilla]: 「Not really... I was just relaying the orders I took.」
[Kashou]: 「We're on the clock, Chocola.」
[Chocola]: 「Grk-nya?!」
[Kashou]: 「We can have a nice, long chat later, okay?」
[Vanilla]: 「Let's get going, Chocola.」
ModelAnswer:
**Vanilla:** "Perfect timing. As expected of you, Master. You never miss a beat."  
**Kashou:** "Vanilla, were you talking about something? The customer seemed to be laughing happily."  
**Vanilla:** "...Mm."  
**Vanilla:** "Chocola and I are very close, after all."  
**Kashou:** "Haha... even a stranger can tell just by looking at you two."  
**Vanilla:** "Fufu..."  
**Chocola:** "Nyaa! Master and Vanilla seem to be having such a good time talking!"  
**Chocola:** "Please let Chocola join in too!"  
**Vanilla:** "It's nothing... I just took their order."  
**Kashou:** "You're on the clock, Chocola."  
**Chocola:** "Ginyaa!?"  
**Kashou:** "If you want to chat, we can do it later at length."  
**Vanilla:** "Let's go, Chocola."

Question:

[ショコラ]: 「そう言ってましたもんね、ご主人さま！」
[嘉祥]: 「うん。ちゃんと名前と年齢と連絡先、書いてもらったか？」
[ショコラ]: 「はい！　今回はバッチリです！」
[ショコラ]: 「種類とサイズも、しっかり聞いてあります！」

reference_answer:

[Chocola]: 「Oh, that's ryght!」
[Chocola]: 「Master, we have an order for a birthday cake!」
[Kashou]: 「Ooh, that's good news.」
[Vanilla]: 「...Birthdays are a special time for everyone. It is a great honor for someone to select a cake from La Soleil for their once-a-year celebration.」

[Kashou]: 「Sure have. So, did you make sure to get their name, age, and contact info?」
[Chocola]: 「Yes! All here, perfectly, this time!」

[Chocola]: 「Um, well...」

[Chocola]: "Oh, that's right!"
[Chocola]: "Master, we've received an order for a birthday cake!"
[Kashou]: "Oh, that's great to hear."

[Chocola]: "Yes! Everything is perfect this time!"

[Chocola]: "Umm..."

Question:

[バニラ]: 「夏服でも、歩き回っていると気にならなかったけど……」

reference_answer:
[Kashou]: 「Good grief... Good thing the customer didn't leave yet.」
[Vanilla]: 「I think making an entry form would be a good idea after all. I'll spruce one up later, okay?」
[Kashou]: 「Thanks, I'd appreciate that.」
[Kashou]: 「By the way, how are the winter clothes treating you? It's not too hot or anything indoors for you, is it?」
[Vanilla]: 「I was comfortable enough walking around in summer clothes as well, but...」
[Vanilla]: 「Once the door is opened and the breeze comes in, I end up longing for the space heater.」
[Vanilla]: 「The winter clothes are warm. These are good. I'm grateful.」
[Kashou]: 「Well, that's good to hear.」
[Chocola]: 「Chocola is back! The winter clothes are perfect; they're so cute, Master!」
[Kashou]: 「Hahah. Then asking Shigure to prepare them was the right call.」
ModelAnswer:
**Kashou:** "Well, that's a relief... I'm glad the customer left before this."
**Vanilla:** "Perhaps we should make a questionnaire. Should I prepare one later?"
**Kashou:** "Thank you, that would be helpful."
**Kashou:** "By the way, how does the winter uniform feel? Is it too warm inside?"
**Vanilla:** "Even in summer clothes, I didn't notice much walking around..."
**Vanilla:** "But when the door opened and the outside air came in, I longed for a heater."
**Vanilla:** "The winter uniform is warm. This is good. Thank you."
**Kashou:** "That's good to hear."
**Chocola:** "Chocola is back! The winter uniform is so cute, everything is perfect, Master!"
**Kashou:** "Haha. I knew it was the right choice to have Shigure prepare them."

It sinks into me that this is no longer my former home, where I can relax. For me, this place has transformed into a battlefield.
[Kashou]: 「I-I'm home.」
It really has been a long time since I've come home. I'm not even sure if I should say 'I'm home' or not.

[Kashou]: 「H-Heya...」

**Kashou:** "Haa..."
He realized that this place, which should be his safe and comforting home, was now a battleground for him.
**Kashou:** "...I'm, I'm back."
It had been so long since he'd returned. He wondered if it was even right to say "I'm back."
**Shigure:** "Welcome home, Brother!"
**Kashou:** "H-hey..."
**Chocola:** "Shigure-chan, welcome home~♪"
**Vanilla:** "A nostalgic scent... Sniff sniff."
**Azuki:** "We come back every day, so it's not like we feel any freshness or nostalgia, y'know?"
**Maple:** "But I do feel a little bit of nostalgia having Kashou here."

[Azuki]: "Don't eat so much the guest of honor runs out of food, geez!"
[Coconut]: "Ah, au..."
[Kashou]: "Haha... Well, I knew Coconut would eat a lot, so I made plenty."

Question:

[メイプル]: 「ガラスのティーポットなら、茶葉に入った花びらが、お湯に踊る様子も楽しめるの」

[時雨]: 「母様、改めまして――お誕生日、おめでとうございます」
言いながら、時雨がラッピングされた小箱を取りだした。

[時雨]: 「写真立てです。前に、大きいのが欲しいとおっしゃっていたので」

reference_answer:
[Cinnamon]: 「Hah... The dishes are good for sure, but this tea... Such a heavenly aroma~ The flavor is bursting in my mouth. Your tea choices are second to none, May-chan♪」
[Maple]: 「Tea leaves with a rich aroma suit a party atmosphere well. Today, I went with a champagne flavor.」
[Maple]: 「And with a glass teapot, you get to enjoy the sight of the flower petals mixed with the tea leaves dancing around in the water.」
[Cinnamon]: 「Fantastic~ Absolutely fantastic, May-chan~♪ Cinnamon is drooliiiing~...!」
[Shigure]: 「Mother, I'd like to say it once more: Happy birthday to you.」
Shigure pulls out a small gift-wrapped box as she speaks.
[Awayuki]: 「My, my, what could it be?」
[Shigure]: 「A picture frame. I got it because you mentioned that you wanted a big one before.」
[Awayuki]: 「My, oh my, this is wonderful! Are you sure? Are you positive? Thank you, Shigure!」
ModelAnswer:
[Cinnamon]: "Ahh… Cooking is nice, but this tea… it smells so good! It's like a burst of flavor, just as expected from Maple-chan’s choice ♪"  
[Maple]: "Strong-scented teas pair well with parties. Today’s is champagne flavored."  
[Maple]: "With a glass teapot, you can enjoy the petals inside the tea leaves dancing in the hot water too."  
[Cinnamon]: "Amazing~♪ Maple-chan, you’re the best~♪ Cinnamon’s getting all flustered…!!"  

[Shigure]: "Mother, once again—Happy Birthday."  
As she said this, Shigure took out a wrapped small box.  
[Awayuki]: "Oh my, what is it?"  
[Shigure]: "It's a photo frame. You mentioned wanting a larger one before."  
[Awayuki]: "Oh my, how lovely! Is it alright? Thank you so much, Shigure!"

[メイプル]: 「あ、そうだ。まだ嘉祥が渡してないじゃないの」

Question:
[淡雪]: 「昔から、嘉祥は１つのことに夢中になると、他のことを忘れてしまうんだから」
[嘉祥]: 「返す言葉もない」
[淡雪]: 「いいのよ、嘉祥はケーキ屋さんなんだから。ケーキが一番のプレゼントだわ」
[嘉祥]: 「そう言ってもらえると……。でも、近いうちに持ってくるよ」
[淡雪]: 「そう？　楽しみにしているわ」
[時雨]: 「それでは、ちょっと予定と違いますが、ケーキを出しましょうか」
[ショコラ]: 「わーい！　ご主人さまのケーキにゃ！」
[ココナツ]: 「ケーキ！　ぼ、ぼく、持ってくるよ！！」
[バニラ]: 「待った、ココナツ。落ちついて。ステイ」
reference_answer:
[Awayuki]: 「You've always been the type to forget about everything else when you get focused on one thing, Kashou.」
[Kashou]: 「I don't know what to say.」
[Awayuki]: 「Oh, it's fine. You're a cake baker, Kashou. A cake is the best present I could ask for.」
[Kashou]: 「I'm glad to hear you say that... Still, I'll bring you a proper present sometime soon.」
[Awayuki]: 「Oh, really? Then, I look forward to it.」
[Shigure]: 「Well then, it deviates from my plans slightly, but why don't we bring out the cake now?」
[Chocola]: 「Yay! It's time for Master's cake, nya!」
[Coconut]: 「Cake! I-I volunteer to bring it out!」
[Vanilla]: 「Hold it, Coconut. Down, girl. Stay.」
ModelAnswer:
**Awayuki:** "As always, Kashou gets so absorbed in one thing that he forgets everything else."
**Kashou:** "...I have no defense."
**Awayuki:** "It's fine. You're a baker, after all. A cake is the best present you can give."
**Kashou:** "If you say so... But I'll bring it soon."
**Awayuki:** "Is that so? I'm looking forward to it."
**Shigure:** "Well then, slightly deviating from our plans, shall we have some cake?"
**Chocola:** "Yay! Master's cake, nya!"
**Coconut:** "Cake! I-I'll go get it!!"
**Vanilla:** "Wait, Coconut. Calm down. Stay."

Question:
お客さんからお褒めの言葉をもらうことはあるが、母親から言われると妙に照れてしまう。
ネコたちも、瞳を輝かせていた。
[ショコラ]: 「ステキですにゃ、ご主人さま～！」
[バニラ]: 「良い」
[アズキ]: 「まぁ、アタシは手伝ったから、完成品を見てっけどな」
[メイプル]: 「気合い入ってるわね」
[シナモン]: 「お、おいしそう～……じゅるり」
[ココナツ]: 「すごい……かわいい。食べちゃうのがもったいないくらいだよ！」
[淡雪]: 「ほんと。切ってしまうのが、もったいないわねー」
[淡雪]: 「ずっと部屋に飾っておきたいくらい」
[時雨]: 「わかります、母様！」
[淡雪]: 「でしょう？」
reference_answer:
I've certainly gotten compliments from customers before, but getting one from my own mother is making me blush, oddly enough.
All of the catgirls have their eyes alight.
[Chocola]: 「That is so lovely, Master~!」
[Vanilla]: 「Very good.」
[Azuki]: 「I mean, I helped with it, but call me curious to see the finished product.」
[Maple]: 「You really went all out.」
[Cinnamon]: 「I-It looks so delicious~... Slurp.」
[Coconut]: 「Amazing... It's so cute. It almost feels like a shame to eat it!」
[Awayuki]: 「It really does. Cutting into it feels almost criminal.」
[Awayuki]: 「I want to just keep it as a room decoration forever.」
[Shigure]: 「I know how you feel, Mother!」
[Awayuki]: 「Right?」
ModelAnswer:
**SPEAKER_NAME: "DIALOGUE"**  

It feels different when I receive praise from customers, but hearing it from Mother makes me strangely bashful. The cats' eyes are sparkling with excitement.  

**[Chocola]:** *"So beautiful, Master~!"*  
**[Vanilla]:** *"Good."*  
**[Azuki]:** *"Well, I helped out, so I'm just looking at the finished product, y'know?"*  
**[Maple]:** *"You really put your heart into this."*  
**[Cinnamon]:** *"O-ohhh, it looks delicious… *drool*"*  
**[Coconut]:** *"Amazing… so cute. It's almost a shame to eat it!"*  
**[Awayuki]:** *"I know, right? It’s too pretty to cut up."*  
**[Awayuki]:** *"I’d want to keep it displayed in my room forever."*  
**[Shigure]:** *"I understand completely, Mother!"*  
**[Awayuki]:** *"Of course?"*

[character] Name: Minaduki Awayuki (水無月 淡雪) | Gender: Female
[character] Name: Maple (メイプル) | Gender: Female
Question:
[メイプル]: 「それだと食べられないので……切りますよ？」
[時雨]: 「そうですね。仕方ありません、やってください、メイプル」
[メイプル]: 「さくさくさく、っと」
メイプルがケーキに包丁を入れ、手早く切り分けていく。
[淡雪]: 「あらー……」
[淡雪]: 「なんだか、ネコたちも、ずいぶん手慣れたわね。包丁の扱いがプロみたいだわ」
[時雨]: 「お店で働いてますから、もうプロですよ、母様」
[淡雪]: 「あら、そうよね！　うふふ……頼もしいわね」
ケーキが切り分け終わった、そのときだった――
玄関のほうから、扉が開く音がする。
[時雨]: 「えっ！？」
[淡雪]: 「あら、この開け方は、お父さまねぇ。今日は早く帰ってきたみたい」
reference_answer:
[Maple]: 「We won't be able to eat it if it spoils, so... it has to get cut.」
[Shigure]: 「You're right. It's a necessary evil. Please, do the deed, Maple.」
[Maple]: 「All right, slice, slice, slice.」
Maple puts the kitchen knife into the cake and quickly slices the cake into pieces.
[Awayuki]: 「Oh my...」
[Awayuki]: 「Seems the catgirls have become quite skilled themselves. She's handling the knife like a professional.」
[Shigure]: 「They all work in the shop, so they are professionals, Mother.」
[Awayuki]: 「Oh my, that's right! Tee hee hee... Such reliable girls.」
Once the cake is all sliced up, that's when it happens—
From the foyer, the sound of the door opening echoes.
[Shigure]: 「Huh?!」
[Awayuki]: 「Oh, that sounds like your father opening the door. He must be back early today.」
ModelAnswer:
**MEIPURU:** "If it's like that, you can't eat it... I'll cut it for you?"
**SHIGURE:** "Yes. It can't be helped, please go ahead, Maple."
**MEIPURU:** "Snip-snip-snip!"
Maple cuts into the cake and quickly divides it.
**ATAYUKI:** "Oh my..."
**ATAYUKI:** "My, haven't you cats become quite skilled? You handle knives like professionals."
**SHIGURE:** "We work at the shop, so we're practically pros, Mother."
**ATAYUKI:** "Oh, that's right! Hehe... how dependable."
Just as the cake was finished being cut—
The sound of a door opening comes from the entrance.
**SHIGURE:** "Eh!?"
**ATAYUKI:** "Ah, that way of opening the door is Father. Seems he's home early today."

[character] Name: Cinnamon (シナモン) | Gender: Female

[character] Name: Chocola (ショコラ) | Gender: Female
Question:
俺は緊張して身を固くする。
ネコたちも息を呑んだ。
[州浜]: 「…………ふん」
この男が、俺の父親――水無月州浜だ。
[時雨]: 「あの、父様……今夜は、商工会の寄合だったはずでは……？」
[州浜]: 「そうだが……私が帰宅すると、不都合でも？」
[時雨]: 「そ、そんなことは……」
[ショコラ]: 「あの！　ご主人さまのお父さま、お帰りなさーい！」
[バニラ]: 「ご主人のお父上、予想外にお早いご帰宅」
[ココナツ]: 「お、お父さま、お帰りなさいませ！」
[州浜]: 「うむ」
[メイプル]: 「……これ、やばいんじゃないかしら？」
reference_answer:
My body freezes up from the tension.
The catgirls are also taken aback.
[Suhama]: 「...Hmph.」
This man is my father, Suhama Minaduki.
[Shigure]: 「Um, Father... I thought you had a community chamber get-together to attend tonight...?」
[Suhama]: 「I did. Is there something wrong with me coming back home?」
[Shigure]: 「N-No, that isn't what I meant...」
[Chocola]: 「Um! Welcome back home, Master's Father!」
[Vanilla]: 「Master's Father, you have returned earlier than we anticipated.」
[Coconut]: 「F-Father, welcome back!」
[Suhama]: 「Mm-hmm.」
[Maple]: 「...Hey, isn't this bad news?」
ModelAnswer:
I stiffened, nervous.
The cats held their breath too.

**Suhama:** "……Hmph."
This man is my father—Minaduki Suhama.

**Shigure:** "Um, Father… wasn't tonight supposed to be the Chamber of Commerce meeting…?"

**Suhama:** "It was. Is it a problem that I've returned home?"

**Shigure:** "N-no, it's just…"

**Chocola:** "Oh! Welcome home, Master’s father!"

**Vanilla:** "Master's father has returned earlier than expected."

**Coconut:** "O-oh, Father, welcome home!"

**Suhama:** "Hmm."
**Maple:** "...This might be bad, don't you think?"

Question:
[淡雪]: 「嬉しかったわよ。こんな賑やかなのは久しぶりだもの」
[淡雪]: 「お父さま、座ってはどうかしら。嘉祥のケーキ、とっても美味しそうでしょう？」
[時雨]: 「あ、そうです！　父様、今日こそ兄様のケーキを食べてください！」
[時雨]: 「食べてみれば、兄様が本気で打ちこんでいるってわかるはずです！」
俺は思わず息を呑んだ。父親が、俺の作ったケーキを食べるだろうか？
何と言うだろうか？
[ショコラ]: 「賛成です！　ご主人さまの美味しいケーキを食べれば、みんな仲良しにゃのです！」
[バニラ]: 「間違いない」
[ココナツ]: 「うんうん！　お兄ちゃんのケーキ、本当に美味しいんだから！」
reference_answer:
[Awayuki]: 「I'm so glad that you did. It hasn't been this lively in quite some time, after all.」
[Awayuki]: 「Father, why not take a seat? Kashou's cake looks quite good, doesn't it?」
[Shigure]: 「Oh, yes! Father, today should be the day you partake in one of Nii-sama's cakes!」
[Shigure]: 「If you do, you will realize that Nii-sama has really devoted his all toward baking it!」
I find myself taken aback. Would Dad consider eating a cake I made?
What would he say?
[Chocola]: 「Chocola agrees! One bite of Master's delicious cake and everyone gets alyong!」
[Vanilla]: 「Without a shadow of a doubt.」
[Coconut]: 「Yeah! Yeah! Onii-chan's cakes are really good, after all!」
ModelAnswer:
**Awayuki:** "I was so happy. It's been a long time since we've had such a lively gathering."
**Awayuki:** "Father, why don't you sit down? Kashou's cake looks absolutely delicious, doesn't it?"
**Shigure:** "Oh, that's right! Father, please try Brother's cake today!"
**Shigure:** "If you taste it, you'll know how seriously he takes his baking!"
I couldn't help but hold my breath. Would my father actually eat the cake I made?
What would he say?

**Chocola:** "I agree! If everyone eats Master's delicious cake, they'll all get along purr-fectly!"
**Vanilla:** "No doubt about it."
**Coconut:** "Yeah, yeah! Big Brother's cake is really yummy!"

Question:

父親が部屋を出て行った。

reference_answer:

[Suhama]: 「Sigh... Seems that telling you isn't enough for you to understand.」
[Suhama]: 「Just wait here.」
Dad leaves the room.
[Kashou]: 「What's he trying to prove?」
[Shigure]: 「I'm sorry, Nii-sama, Mother... It is my fault for spoiling your birthday party...」
[Kashou]: 「Shigure, you did nothing wrong. I said it before... Coming back home today was my decision.」
[Awayuki]: 「That's right. Besides, it's been lively and fun just like the old days.」
[Shigure]: 「But things seems to be developing into a fight...」
[Awayuki]: 「Tee hee, Kashou and your father always go at it like this.」
ModelAnswer:

**Suhama:** "Hmph… Seems words won't get through to you."
**Suhama:** "Wait here for a while."
The father left the room.
**Kashou:** "What was all that about…?"
**Shigure:** "I'm sorry, Brother, Mother… It's my fault… Ruining what should have been a birthday party…"
**Kashou:** "Shigure isn't to blame. Like I said earlier… The decision to come back today was mine."
**Awayuki:** "That's right. It'll be lively and fun like it used to be."
**Shigure:** "But, it turned into an argument…"
**Awayuki:** "Fufu… Kashou and Father are always like this."

metadata:
[character] Name: Vanilla (バニラ) | Gender: Female
[character] Name: Chocola (ショコラ) | Gender: Female
[character] Name: Minaduki Kashou (水無月 嘉祥) | Gender: Male | Aliases: Master (ご主人さま)
Question:
俺は、それだけを告げると、水無月の家から出ていた。まるで逃げるように。
いろいろなことが頭の中で駆け巡り、思考がごちゃごちゃになった。
気がつけば、俺は夜の公園にいた。
[嘉祥]: 「あ……」
家の鍵もサイフも、全て鞄に入れて、置いてきてしまった。
[嘉祥]: 「……なにやってるんだ、俺は」
[ショコラ]: 「……ご主人さま」
[嘉祥]: 「ショコラ……！」
[バニラ]: 「ご主人、忘れ物」
バニラの手には、俺の鞄があった。
[嘉祥]: 「持ってきてくれたのか、バニラ」
[バニラ]: 「当然のこと。野宿は困る」
[嘉祥]: 「そりゃそうだな」
鍵がなかったら、俺だけでなく２匹も家に入れないところだ。
reference_answer:
That's all I say before leaving the Minaduki house. Almost as if I'm running away.
I have so many things running through my mind that my thoughts are a jumbled mess.
Before I realize it, I'm standing in the park in the middle of the night.
[Kashou]: 「Aah...」
I left my house keys, wallet, and everything else in my bag back at the house.
[Kashou]: 「...What am I even doing?」
[Chocola]: 「...Master.」
[Kashou]: 「Chocola...!」
[Vanilla]: 「You forgot this, Master.」
Vanilla is holding my bag.
[Kashou]: 「You fetched that for me, Vanilla?」
[Vanilla]: 「Naturally. We can't camp outside.」
[Kashou]: 「Good point.」
Without the key to the house, not only would I be locked out, but so would these two.
ModelAnswer:
**Kashou:** "I just told him that, and left the Minaduki house. As if I were running away."  

All sorts of thoughts raced through my head, my mind a jumbled mess. Before I knew it, I was in a park at night.  

**[Kashou]**: "Ah..."  
I’d put everything—my house keys and wallet—in my bag and left them behind.  

**[Kashou]**: "...What am I even doing?"  

**[Chocola]**: "...Master?"  

**[Kashou]**: "Chocola...!"  

**[Vanilla]**: "Master, you forgot something."  
Vanilla held out my bag to me.  

**[Kashou]**: "You brought it for me, Vanilla?"  

**[Vanilla]**: "Of course. You can't sleep outside."  

**[Kashou]**: "True enough."  
Without the keys, not only would I be locked out, but so would they.

I do feel pretty darn cold, now that I realize it, though.

Question:
[時雨]: 「ふふ……私は兄様を応援していますから」
[時雨]: 「ここで英気を養って、兄様が頑張ってくださる……その姿こそが、私の一番の幸福です」
[嘉祥]: 「そう言ってくれるのは、嬉しいけどな」
[時雨]: 「むしろ、私の生き甲斐。養分。必須栄養素。水と空気と太陽光なのです」
大袈裟な――と思ったが、俺は時雨の応援に甘えることにした。
チェックインを済ませ、部屋へ。
[時雨]: 「あの……どうですか、兄様？　おかしく、ありませんか？」
[嘉祥]: 「よく似合うよ、時雨。いつも和服だから、まったく違和感ない」
[時雨]: 「はう……そうですよね。嬉しいような、肩透かしのような……」
reference_answer:
[Shigure]: 「Hee hee... I am here to support you, Nii-sama.」
[Shigure]: 「Seeing you regain your energy here and working your hardest is the ultimate happiness for me.」
[Kashou]: 「I do appreciate you saying that, but still...」
[Shigure]: 「In fact, it is my purpose in life. My nourishment, my essential nutrients, my water, air, and sunlight.」
While I think she's exaggerating like crazy, I decide to take Shigure up on her support.
We finish checking in and head to our rooms.
[Shigure]: 「Um... How is it, Nii-sama? It doesn't look... odd, I hope?」
[Kashou]: 「It looks great on you, Shigure. You always wear Japanese clothes anyway, so there's not a single thing off about it.」
[Shigure]: 「Hngh... Yes, I suppose. Though, I'm not sure if that is a compliment or a deflection...」
ModelAnswer:
**Shigure:** "Fufu... I'm cheering you on, Brother."
**Shigure:** "By nurturing yourself here, and seeing you work so hard... that's my greatest happiness."
**Kashou:** "I appreciate you saying that, but..."
**Shigure:** "Rather, it's my reason for living. Nourishment. An essential nutrient. Water, air, sunlight—it is all of those things to me."

*Thinking: Over the top as always—but I'll take Shigure’s support.*

After checking in, we head to our room.
**Shigure:** "Um... how does it look on me, Brother? Does it not suit me?"
**Kashou:** "It looks great on you, Shigure. You always wear kimonos, so it doesn't feel strange at all."
**Shigure:** "Hauu... I suppose that's true. It makes me happy and a little disappointed at the same time..."

metadata: [character] Name: Minaduki Kashou (水無月 嘉祥) | Gender: Male | Aliases: Master (ご主人さま)
Question:
仕入れ先に頼みたいことがあった。急ぎではないが、早いうちに電話しておいたほうがいい。
個人経営のパティスリーなら普通のことだと思うが、俺は仕入れ先の一つ一つと自分で交渉をしている。
一般流通されていないような食材も、まとまった量を仕入れるなら、売ってくれる農家もある。
味の探究は、食材を探す旅でもあった。
皆が観光で盛り上がっているときに、仕事の話をするのも野暮なので、俺は私用があると言って、部屋を離れる。
念のために旅館からも出て、静かな場所で話すことにした。
電話をかける。
[嘉祥]: 「Bonjour, c'est Kashou Minaduki de La Soleil Japon. Est-ce que je pourrais parler à M. James Carter?」
[嘉祥]: 「ふぅ……」
国外からの注文ということで先方に驚かれたが、どうにか発送してくれそうだ。
俺は旅館の中へと戻る。
reference_answer:
There's something I wanna request from a supplier. It's no rush, but it's a good idea to give him a phone call as soon as possible.
I think it's pretty common for an independently-owned patisserie, but I negotiate with every single supplier on my own.
Even for ingredients not in circulation for the general public, if I need to replenish my supply of them in bulk, there are farmers who will buy it for me.
Researching flavors is also a journey to search for ingredients.
Since it'd be uncouth of me to talk about work when everyone is excited about sightseeing, I tell them that I have personal business to take care of and leave the room.
Just to be sure, I leave the inn and decide to talk someplace quieter.
I make my phone call.
[Kashou]: 「Bonjour, c'est Kashou Minaduki de La Soleil Japon. Est-ce que je pourrais parler à M. James Carter?」
[Kashou]: 「Phew...」
I was met with surprise from the other person on the line since it was an order from overseas, but it seems they'll be putting in my order.
I return to the inn.
ModelAnswer:
There was something I wanted to ask my suppliers. It wasn't urgent, but it would be best to call them as soon as possible.

I think it's common practice for independently owned patisseries, but I negotiate with each of my suppliers myself.

Even farmers who don't usually sell to the general public will sometimes sell to me if I'm buying in bulk.

The pursuit of flavor was also a journey of searching for ingredients.

It would be impolite to talk about work when everyone else is excited about sightseeing, so I said I had personal business and left the room.

Just in case, I went outside the inn as well and found a quiet place to make the call.

I dialed the number.

**Kashou:** "Bonjour, this is Kashou Minaduki from La Soleil Japon. May I speak with Mr. James Carter?"

**Kashou:** "Phew…"

They were surprised by the overseas order, but they seemed willing to arrange shipment somehow.

I returned to the inn.

[Kashou]: 「Interesting.」
So Chocola and Cinnamon went somewhere else while these two duked it out in ping-pong, then.
[Kashou]: 「Now that I think of it, seeing you two together is a rare sight.」
ModelAnswer:
**Minaduki Kashou**: "Sorry. Did I interrupt?"
**Maple**: "What are you talking about? This is just a game, isn't it?"
**Vanilla**: "But you said 'serious' earlier."
**Maple**: "Ugh... next time. Next time I'll be serious."
Apparently, Vanilla won that last rally.
**Minaduki Kashou**: "I couldn't see the ball at all. Cats really *are* amazing."
**Vanilla**: "Master, that's not quite right."
**Maple**: "Even cats have their weaknesses, you know? Cinnamon swings and misses all the time."
**Vanilla**: "Chocola just catches it with her hands."
**Minaduki Kashou**: "I see..."
So Chocola and Cinnamon went elsewhere, leaving only these two to compete.
**Minaduki Kashou**: "Come to think of it, it's rare for it to be just Maple and Vanilla."

Question:
[メイプル]: 「まぁ、べつに意図的に避けてるわけではないし？」
[バニラ]: 「たまには遊んであげないと」
[メイプル]: 「それは、年長者であるあたしの台詞でしょうが！？」

[バニラ]: 「……あ、シナモンが呼んでる」
[メイプル]: 「え？」
メイプルが視線を逸らした瞬間――
[バニラ]: 「隙アリ！」
カッ！　とボールが弾む音をたてて、バニラのサービスエースが決まった。
[バニラ]: 「勝利」
reference_answer:
[Maple]: 「Maybe, but it's not like we've been intentionally avoiding contact with one another.」
[Vanilla]: 「I've got to make sure to play with her every once in a while.」
[Maple]: 「Shouldn't that be my line since I'm the older one here?!」
[Vanilla]: 「Tee hee... I never said that I was playing seriously.」
[Maple]: 「It can't be! No, there's no way you...」
[Maple]: 「I admit that I was surprised at how capable you were, but you should still be a far cry from my skills.」
[Vanilla]: 「...Oh, Cinnamon is calling us.」
[Maple]: 「Huh?」
And the moment that Maple's eyes go astray—
[Vanilla]: 「Wide open!」
With a loud 'tic' of the ball being ricocheted across the table, Vanilla serves an ace over Maple.
[Vanilla]: 「Victory.」
ModelAnswer:
**MEAPLE:** "Well, it's not like I'm intentionally avoiding you or anything?"
**VANILLA:** "You should play with her sometimes."
**MEAPLE:** "That's the line for me, as the older one here!?"
**VANILLA:** "Fufu… I haven't even started using my full power yet."
**MEAPLE:** "No way!? No, there's no way that's true..."
**MEAPLE:** "I was surprised Vanilla is surprisingly skilled, but I should still be faster."
**VANILLA:** "...Ah, Cinnamon's calling me."
**MEAPLE:** "Huh?"
The instant Maple looked away—
**VANILLA:** "Opening!"
*Thwack!* The sound of the ball bouncing as Vanilla's serve ace sealed the victory.
**VANILLA:** "Victory."

I leave the ping-pong table and head someplace else.
I find Azuki and Cinnamon in the game corner. I feel like seeing these two together is pretty rare, too.

Azuki is playing silently while Cinnamon is watching from behind, rocking her body from side to side and letting out bizarre yelps.

I stepped away from the ping pong table and headed elsewhere.

metadata:
[character] Name: Minaduki Kashou (水無月 嘉祥) | Gender: Male | Aliases: Master (ご主人さま)
[character] Name: Minaduki Shigure (水無月 時雨) | Gender: Female
Question:
[嘉祥]: 「どれ、１つ食べてみるか」
屋台で温泉まんじゅうを１つ買った。
できたて熱々だ。
かじってみると、ふっくらしていて、思っていたよりしっとりした食感だった。
舌のうえで、ほろほろと餡子が崩れて、甘味が広がる。
[嘉祥]: 「なるほど……ほふほふ……これは、美味しいな」
俺が作る洋菓子も、実家の和菓子も、温かいものを出すということはない。
熱々のまんじゅうを、ほふほふ言いながら食べるのは、これはこれで面白い体験だった。
[嘉祥]: 「そういえば、温泉街には何度か来ているけれど……食べたことなかったな」
昔はネコたちがいなかったからだ。
両親と時雨と俺の４人で旅行しても、買い食いしようなんて話にはならなかった。
reference_answer:
[Kashou]: 「Well then, maybe I should have one.」
I buy a hot-spring manju bun from the stand.
It's freshly made and piping hot.
I take a bite into it, and my mouth is greeted by a fluffy and moist sensation.
Atop my tongue, the red bean paste starts to break down, and the sweetness starts to spread.
[Kashou]: 「Now I see... Fff, Fff... This is pretty good.」
Neither the Western sweets I make nor the Japanese sweets my family makes are ever served warm.
Eating a piping-hot manju bun while huffing to cool it down in my mouth is a pretty interesting experience in its own right.
[Kashou]: 「You know, I've been to the hot spring district plenty of times in the past, but... I never ate one of these before.」
Mostly because the catgirls weren't around back then.
Even when the four of us—my parents, Shigure, and I—traveled, buying local snacks and eating never came into the equation.
ModelAnswer:
**Kashou:** "Alright, shall we try one?"  

He bought a *onsen manju* (hot spring bun) from the food stall. It was freshly made and piping hot. Taking a bite, it was fluffy and moister than he expected. The red bean paste crumbled on his tongue, spreading sweetness.  

**Kashou:** "I see… *hofu hofu*… This is delicious."  

Neither the Western sweets he makes nor the traditional Japanese sweets from his family business serve warm items. Eating a hot manju while making those noises was an interesting experience in its own way.  

**Kashou:** "Come to think of it, I've been to onsen towns before… but I never tried one."  

That's because the cats weren't around back then. Even when my parents, Shigure, and I went on trips, we never talked about grabbing street food.

metadata:
[character] Name: Minaduki Shigure (水無月 時雨) | Gender: Female
[character] Name: Minaduki Kashou (水無月 嘉祥) | Gender: Male | Aliases: Master (ご主人さま)
[element] Name: Bell (鈴) | Type: Accessory
[element] Name: La Soleil (ラ・ソレイユ) | Type: Place
Question:
[嘉祥]: 「やあ、ここに居たのか、時雨。もしかして用事？」
[時雨]: 「いいえ、もう大丈夫です」
[嘉祥]: 「もしかして、時雨も仕事の電話だったのかな？」
[時雨]: 「……は、はい。すみません。せっかくの旅行中に」
[嘉祥]: 「謝るようなことじゃないよ。ソレイユは定休日だけど、世間は平日なんだし」
詳しくは聞いていないが、時雨は会社を経営しているらしい。
その収入で、ネコたちの衣服を買ったり、鈴持ちの受験をさせたり。
父親は俺に対しては厳しいが、妹の時雨には甘い。ネコのことも商売のことも、自由にさせているようだった。
[嘉祥]: 「ネコたちは、思い思いに満喫してたよ。卓球とか、ゲームとか……売店とか」
reference_answer:
[Kashou]: 「Heya, so this is where you've been, Shigure? Did you need something?」
[Shigure]: 「No, I'm fine now.」
[Kashou]: 「Did you have to put in a call for work, too, by any chance?」
[Shigure]: 「...Y-Yes. I apologize for doing it in the middle of our vacation.」
[Kashou]: 「Nothing to apologize over. La Soleil may be on a regular holiday, but it is a weekday by normal standards.」
She never told me the specifics, but Shigure apparently runs a company.
With her income, she's able to buy the catgirls' clothes and allow them to take bell-holder exams, among other things.
My dad is harsh toward me, but he's soft toward my younger sister, Shigure. It seems that he is pretty liberal toward the catgirls and his business.
[Kashou]: 「The catgirls are enjoying themselves individually. Playing ping-pong, playing video games... buying from the concession stand.」
ModelAnswer:
**Kashou:** "Hey, Shigure. Were you here all along? Did you need something?"
**Shigure:** "No, I'm alright now."
**Kashou:** "Was that a work call for you too, Shigure?"
**Shigure:** "...Y-yes. Sorry. During our trip and all..."
**Kashou:** "Don't apologize. Soleil is closed today, but the rest of the world still has weekdays."
(I haven’t heard the details, but apparently Shigure runs a company.
She uses the income to buy clothes for the Neko and let Bell take the exam to become a bell-ringer.
My father is strict with me, but he's lenient towards my sister Shigure. He seems to let her do as she pleases regarding both the Neko and business.)
**Kashou:** "The Neko were enjoying themselves in their own ways. Ping-pong, games… and the shop."

metadata:
[character] Name: Minaduki Shigure (水無月 時雨) | Gender: Female
[character] Name: Minaduki Kashou (水無月 嘉祥) | Gender: Male | Aliases: Master (ご主人さま)
Question:
[時雨]: 「それはよかったです。……兄様、たまには兄妹水入らずで遊びませんか？」
[嘉祥]: 「いいけど、何する？」
[時雨]: 「カラオケルームがあるそうですよ？」
[嘉祥]: 「カラオケか……高校時代に、ちょっと行ったきりだな。時雨、歌えるのか？」
[時雨]: 「幼少期に合唱をやっていましたから、少しは」
そういうことになった。
[時雨]: 「それでは、兄様への想いを込めて……」
歌いはじめると、雰囲気が一変した。
[時雨]: 「～～～♪」
[嘉祥]: 「……すごい」
[時雨]: 「はぁ～、ひさしぶりに大きな声を出しました」
[嘉祥]: 「めちゃくちゃ上手いじゃないか！」
はっきり言って、プロ並だった。俺は惜しみない拍手を送る。
reference_answer:
[Shigure]: 「I am glad to hear that... Nii-sama, how about we both enjoy ourselves—just us, as brother and sister?」
[Kashou]: 「Sure, but what did you have in mind?」
[Shigure]: 「I've heard they have a karaoke room here.」
[Kashou]: 「Karaoke, eh? I only went a bit back in high school. Can you sing, Shigure?」
[Shigure]: 「I dabbled in chorus when I was a child.」
Sounds like a plan, then.
[Shigure]: 「Now then, this will be dedicated to you, Nii-sama...」
Once she starts singing, the mood gets turned on its head.
[Shigure]: 「~~~♪」
[Kashou]: 「...Amazing.」
[Shigure]: 「Hah~ It has been quite some time since I've exerted my voice like that.」
[Kashou]: 「You're REALLY good!」
To be frank, she's practically pro level. I give her generous applause.
ModelAnswer:
**Shigure:** "That's good to hear... Brother, how about we spend some time together just the two of us for once?"  

**Kashou:** "Sure, but what should we do?"  

**Shigure:** "I heard there’s a karaoke room nearby?"  

**Kashou:** "Karaoke, huh…? I haven’t been since high school. Shigure, can you even sing?"  

**Shigure:** "I did choir as a child, so a little."  

And that's how it was decided.  

**Shigure:** "Then, with my feelings for Brother in mind..."  

The moment she started singing, the atmosphere completely changed.  

**Shigure:** "~~♪"**  

**Kashou:** "...Amazing."  

**Shigure:** "Whew~, it’s been a while since I sang so loudly."  

**Kashou:** "You’re incredibly good!"  

Frankly, she was as skilled as a professional. I gave her thunderous applause without hesitation.

metadata:
[character] Name: Minaduki Kashou (水無月 嘉祥) | Gender: Male | Aliases: Master (ご主人さま)
[character] Name: Minaduki Shigure (水無月 時雨) | Gender: Female
Question:
[時雨]: 「そんなに兄様に褒めていただけるなんて……幸福の極みです」
[時雨]: 「私の歌が、兄様に喜んでいただけるなんて……この声が……兄様の記憶に……はぁ、はぁ……」
[時雨]: 「うっ……鼻血が……」
[嘉祥]: 「お、おい、大丈夫か？」
[時雨]: 「ううぅ……よろしければ、次は兄様が歌ってくださいまし」
[嘉祥]: 「うっ……わ、わかった」
２人でカラオケに来て、歌わないというわけにもいかないか。抜群に上手い時雨のあとでは、つらいものがあるが……
[嘉祥]: 「えーっと……新しめの曲だと、留学してたときに覚えたやつが……」
リストを探してみる。
[嘉祥]: 「あれ？　見つからないな……ほどほどにヒット曲だと思うんだけど……？」
reference_answer:
[Shigure]: 「I never expected you to give me such ample praise... I am absolutely thrilled.」
[Shigure]: 「To think that my singing could delight you so much... This voice... is in your memories... Hah, hah...」
[Shigure]: 「Urk... I feel a nosebleed coming on...」
[Kashou]: 「H-Hey, are you all right?」
[Shigure]: 「Unghh... If it is not too much to ask, would you sing a song next?」
[Kashou]: 「Urk... O-Okay, fine.」
The two of us are here to do some karaoke, so I very well can't NOT sing, huh? Though, going up after an excellent singer like Shigure does load on the pressure...
[Kashou]: 「Um, let's see... For newish songs, there's that one I learned back when I was studying abroad...」
I search the list.
[Kashou]: 「Huh? I can't find it... I thought it was more or less a hit song, too...」
ModelAnswer:
**Shigure:** "To receive so much praise from my brother… it's the height of happiness."
**Shigure:** "For my song to bring joy to you, Brother… for this voice to be etched in your memory… haa, haa…"
**Shigure:** "Ugh… I'm getting a nosebleed…"
**Kashou:** "H-hey, are you alright?"
**Shigure:** "Uuu… If it pleases you, Brother, please sing next."
**Kashou:** "Ugh… O-okay."

We came to karaoke together, so I can't exactly not sing. It'll be rough following Shigure's amazing performance…
**Kashou:** "Um… For something newer, there was one I learned when I was studying abroad…"

He searches the song list.
**Kashou:** "Huh? Can't find it… I thought it was a pretty popular hit…?"

[character] Name: Vanilla (バニラ) | Gender: Female
Question:
[嘉祥]: 「うん。メロディが綺麗なんだよ」

[嘉祥]: 「ああ、そうか！」
結局、高校時代に流行っていた曲をうろ覚えで歌った。
[時雨]: 「兄様の歌声、とっても素敵でした」
[一同]: 「いただきますにゃ！いただきますいただきます！いただきますいただきます～！いただきまーす！いただきます」

[Kashou]: 「Sorry... I really just needed to clear my head.」

[Kashou]: 「It's just that I've been thinking back on everything up till now... and I'm almost positive that there's something I'm still lacking.」
[Azuki]: 「What's 'everything up till now' for you, exactly?」
[Kashou]: 「...After I graduated college, I studied abroad in France.」
[Kashou]: 「Graduating and taking over the family business with no other options on the table wasn't satisfactory to me in the least. I wanted to broaden my horizons.」
[Kashou]: 「I don't want you to get the wrong impression, though... It's not like I hate the Minaduki's Japanese-style sweets, got it?」

**KASHOU:** "No, no, I'm definitely over that by now."
**KASHOU:** "It's just, thinking back on things… I was wondering what I lack."

[Kashou]: 「I pleaded with my mentor to take me as their apprentice... and learned the ways of Western confectioneries from them.」
[Kashou]: 「When my study abroad was nearing an end... my mentor told me, 'I've already taught you everything.'」
[Kashou]: 「Although, personally, I don't feel as though I've matched my mentor's distinct flavor in the slightest...」

**Kashou Minaduki:** "This is what I've been searching for—that's what I thought."
**Azuki:** "Something that Minaduki's wagashi shop doesn't have?"
**Kashou Minaduki:** "Minaduki doesn't have a customer seating area. Most of the wagashi we make are sold in department stores."

**Kashou Minaduki:** "As my studies abroad neared their end—my master told me he had taught me everything."
**Kashou Minaduki:** "But I still felt like I hadn't even caught up to my master's flavor..."

reference_answer:

[Kashou]: 「Ah, yeah...」
I'm not going to refute that I wasn't in that state of mind.
I pat my own face down.
[Maple]: 「Tee hee...」
[Kashou]: 「Hm?」
[Maple]: 「You have cream on your cheek.」
Maple uses her fingertip to stroke around my mouth.
Her fingers are smooth and elegant, yet still supple at the same time.
Maple licks the whipped cream she wiped off.

**Kashou:** "Ah, yeah..."
He didn't deny he wasn't in that state of mind. He stroked his own face.
**Maple:** "Fufu…"
**Kashou:** "Hm?"
**Maple:** "You have cream on your cheek."
Maple brushed her fingertip against the corner of his mouth.
Her fingers were smooth, glossy, and yet soft.
Maple licked the cream from her finger.

[Kashou]: 「My dad always speaks with a purpose—especially when it comes to cuisine.」

I take a breath to regain my composure.
Close call. I almost started shouting in front of everyone.

[Kashou]: 「Maple, Cinnamon? You guys are still here?」
I thought that the shop would be closed by now, but here they are...
[Maple]: 「The register count didn't add up. Azuki said 'not to sweat such a small matter', but...」
[Cinnamon]: 「We couldn't help ourselves~ So the two of us recounted it~」
It's rare that our sold stock doesn't add up with the money in the register. If it's too much of a difference, it could be a problem, but...
[Kashou]: 「How much didn't add up?」
[Maple]: 「One yen.」

I take a deep breath.
That was close. I almost raised my voice in front of everyone.

I thought the shop had already closed...

**Cinnamon:** "But we were worried~ So we recounted everything~"
It's rare for the sales and cash in the register to not match, but it's troublesome if there's too much...
**Kashou:** "How much was off?"
**Maple:** "One yen."

**Kashou:** "Well, I can’t exactly say that’s unbelievable."

My roots in Western confectionery lie in France. My mentor runs a pastry shop in Paris.

metadata:
[character] Name: Minaduki Shigure (水無月 時雨) | Gender: Female
[character] Name: Minaduki Kashou (水無月 嘉祥) | Gender: Male | Aliases: Master (ご主人さま)
Question:
[時雨]: 「それに……留学していた頃は……兄様がずっと戻ってこない可能性も、ありましたから」
[嘉祥]: 「あ、なるほど」
俺が洋菓子の道に進んだことで、父親との仲は冷えこんでいた。
留学が終わっても、パリに留まるという可能性も、充分にあったわけだ。
[嘉祥]: 「俺としては、日本で店を開くことは、決めていたんだが……」
[時雨]: 「何か理由があるのでしょうか？」
[嘉祥]: 「やっぱり……親父から逃げた、なんて思われたくなかった。俺にも意地がある」
[嘉祥]: 「あと、師匠に言われたんだよ。ちゃんと父親と話し合ったほうがいい。日本に戻りなさい、って」
[時雨]: 「師匠様が……」
[嘉祥]: 「今では、師匠の味を、俺の生まれ故郷の街に伝えるのも、けっこう意味のあることだと思ってる」
reference_answer:
[Shigure]: 「Also... when you were still studying abroad... there was a chance that you would never come back to Japan.」
[Kashou]: 「Aah, I see now.」
By going down the path of a Western sweets maker, my relationship with my dad soured.
Even when my study abroad was over, there was still a big possibility that I would stay in Paris.
[Kashou]: 「Well, by that time, I made up my mind to open my shop in Japan...」
[Shigure]: 「Was there any reason behind that decision?」
[Kashou]: 「Well... I didn't want people to think that I ran away from Dad. I have my pride.」
[Kashou]: 「Also, my mentor told me to. She said that I should talk it out with my dad and return to Japan.」
[Shigure]: 「Your mentor...」
[Kashou]: 「Nowadays, I think that was really important in bringing my mentor's distinct flavor over to the town I was born and raised in.」
ModelAnswer:
**Shigure:** "Besides… when I was studying abroad, there was always the possibility that you wouldn't come back."  

**Kashou:** "Ah, I see."  
My relationship with Father had grown strained after I chose to pursue Western confectionery.  
Even after my studies ended, there was a good chance I might stay in Paris.  

**Kashou:** "I'd already decided to open a shop in Japan…"  

**Shigure:** "Was there a reason?"  

**Kashou:** "Well… I didn't want people thinking I ran away from Father. I have my pride."  
**Kashou:** "Also, my mentor told me I should talk things over with him properly. He said I should return to Japan."  

**Shigure:** "Mentor-sama…?"  

**Kashou:** "Now, I think bringing my mentor's flavors back to my hometown has some real meaning."

[character] Name: Minaduki Shigure (水無月 時雨) | Gender: Female

Question:
[時雨]: 「はい！」
[嘉祥]: 「さて、そろそろ行こうか。クレープは入りそうかい？」
[時雨]: 「もちろんです、兄様！　はむ！」
[嘉祥]: 「気をつけろよ、時雨。パリは危険な街だからな」
[時雨]: 「え？　は、はい……」
[嘉祥]: 「油断してると、あっという間に体重が増えるぞ。美味しい物がいっぱいあるからな！」
[時雨]: 「ひぇ……」
[嘉祥]: 「ごくり……」
お昼近く――営業時間を待って、俺は店の前まで来た。
約束は取り付けてあるとはいえ……やっぱり、緊張する。
[時雨]: 「まぁ、素敵です！　ここが、本家ラ・ソレイユなのですね、兄様？」
reference_answer:
[Shigure]: 「Indeed!」
[Kashou]: 「Now then, it's about time we get going. Got room for crepes?」
[Shigure]: 「Of course, Nii-sama! Nom!」
[Kashou]: 「Be careful, Shigure. Paris is a dangerous city.」
[Shigure]: 「Huh? Y-Yes, I will...」
[Kashou]: 「If you don't keep up your guard, you'll end up gaining weight before you know it. There's a whole lot of tasty things to be had here!」
[Shigure]: 「Eep...」
[Kashou]: 「Gulp...」
Nearly lunchtime— After waiting for normal business hours, I find myself in front of the shop.
I know that I've made plans, but... I'm still getting nervous.
[Shigure]: 「My, it's splendid! So this is the original La Soleil, isn't it, Nii-sama?!」
ModelAnswer:
**Shigure:** "Yes!"
**Kashou:** "Well, shall we go? Think you can handle the crepes?"
**Shigure:** "Of course, Brother! *munch*"
**Kashou:** "Be careful, Shigure. Paris is a dangerous city."
**Shigure:** "Eh? Y-yes…"
**Kashou:** "If you let your guard down, your weight will balloon in an instant. There's so much delicious food!"
**Shigure:** "Eek…"
**Kashou:** *gulp…*

Near lunchtime—I waited for the store to open and arrived in front of it.
Even though I have an appointment... I'm still nervous.

**Shigure:** "Wow, it's wonderful! So this is the original La Soleil, Brother?"

Question:
[時雨]: 「兄様から何度か話だけは伺っていましたが……とうとう訪れることができました」
[時雨]: 「私にとっては、聖地。まさに、聖地巡礼の気分です」
[嘉祥]: 「……そういうものか？」
[嘉祥]: 「俺は留学先が近いこともあって、懐かしい気分だよ。帰ってきたって感じだ」
[時雨]: 「兄様の留学先、この近くなのですね」
[嘉祥]: 「ああ、この通りを数分歩いた先だな」

[嘉祥]: 「うーん……学生のお客さんもいるけど……」
[嘉祥]: 「やっぱり、主婦が一番多いかな。子連れのお母さんも、よく来るよ」
reference_answer:
[Shigure]: 「You've told me about this place so many times in the past, but... I can't believe I'm finally getting to visit.」
[Shigure]: 「This is sacred ground to me. This whole thing feels like a pilgrimage.」
[Kashou]: 「...Does it?」
[Kashou]: 「Where I studied abroad is close to here, so it's got a lot of nostalgia for me. Kind of like I'm back for the first time in a while.」
[Shigure]: 「Ah, your old school is nearby, Nii-sama?」
[Kashou]: 「Yeah, a few minutes down this street, in fact.」
[Shigure]: 「In that case, are a lot of the customers here at the original La Soleil students?」
[Kashou]: 「Hmm... They have their fair share of students, but...」
[Kashou]: 「I'd say housewives are the biggest group of customers. A lot of mothers come with their kids, too.」
ModelAnswer:
**Shigure:** "I've heard about this place from my brother several times... but I've finally managed to visit."
**Shigure:** "For me, it's a sacred place. It really feels like a pilgrimage."
**Kashou:** "...Is that so?"
**Kashou:** "Since my study abroad destination is nearby, it just makes me feel nostalgic. Like I'm coming home."
**Shigure:** "Your study abroad location is near here, Brother?"
**Kashou:** "Yeah, just a few minutes' walk down this street."
**Shigure:** "In that case, does the main branch of La Soleil get many student customers?"
**Kashou:** "Hmm... we do get students..."
**Kashou:** "But mostly, housewives are our biggest clientele. We also get a lot of mothers with children."

[character] Name: Minaduki Kashou (水無月 嘉祥) | Gender: Male | Aliases: Master (ご主人さま)
[character] Name: Minaduki Shigure (水無月 時雨) | Gender: Female
Question:
[嘉祥]: 「フランスでは、食事のときにケーキを食べるのは、ごく普通のことだ」
[嘉祥]: 「一般家庭でも、夕飯は――サラダ、スープ、パン、魚料理、肉料理、チーズ、デザート……みたいに出すからな」
どのくらい皿数を出すかは、各家庭によるが。
[時雨]: 「毎日がフランス料理ですね」
[嘉祥]: 「だから、ほとんど毎日のようにケーキを食べる人も、そう珍しくないんだよ」
[時雨]: 「ふむふむ……なるほど……」
[時雨]: 「なんだか、不思議な感じがします。ご家庭でコース料理だなんて」
[嘉祥]: 「いやいや……日本の一般的な家庭料理だって、別の国の人からしたら、まるで懐石料理だよ」
[嘉祥]: 「お茶、お米、味噌汁、惣菜、肉魚……使っている皿の数には、大差ないだろ？」
[時雨]: 「言われてみれば……！」
reference_answer:
[Kashou]: 「But here in France, it's extremely common to eat cake at dinner time.」
[Kashou]: 「Even when it comes to normal families, dinner usually goes: Salad, soup, bread, seafood, meat, cheese, desert.」
How many dishes they produce depends on the family, though.
[Shigure]: 「Every day is French cuisine, then.」
[Kashou]: 「So, yeah, it's not that rare to see most people eating a cake almost every day.」
[Shigure]: 「Mm-hmm, mm-hmm... I see.」
[Shigure]: 「I still find it rather curious that households partake in full course meals.」
[Kashou]: 「Well, I mean... even for general home cooking in Japan, from other countries' perspective, it looks like a Japanese version of a full course meal.」
[Kashou]: 「Tea, white rice, miso soup, entrees, meat, and fish... There's not much difference between the amount of dishes they use.」
[Shigure]: 「Oh, when you put it that way...!」
ModelAnswer:
**Kashou:** "In France, it's perfectly normal to eat cake during a meal."
**Kashou:** "Even in ordinary households, dinner might consist of—salad, soup, bread, fish, meat, cheese, and dessert… all at once."
The number of dishes varies from family to family.
**Shigure:** "Every day is like a French feast."
**Kashou:** "That's why it's not unusual for people to eat cake almost every day."
**Shigure:** "Hmm, I see... I understand..."
**Shigure:** "It feels strange. Like having a multi-course meal at home."
**Kashou:** "Well, no… even typical Japanese home cooking can seem like a kaiseki meal to someone from another country."
**Kashou:** "Tea, rice, miso soup, side dishes, meat and fish… the number of plates used isn't that different, is it?"
**Shigure:** "Now that you mention it...!"

Question:

reference_answer:
[Shigure]: 「Oh, I am Shigure Minaduki.」
[Shigure]: 「I-I'm here unannounced since I tagged along... but, of course, I will make sure that I am of no inconvenience!」
[Beignet]: 「Shigure...? Then, you're Kashou's little sister...?」
[Shigure]: 「Y-Yes, ma'am.」
[Kashou]: 「My apologies, Mentor... She followed me of her own accord.」

[Beignet]: 「Oh my, is that so? Kashou couldn't stop talking about his lovely little sister while in France.」
[Kashou]: 「Huh? Th-That isn't true, though...?」

**Shigure:** "Y-yes."
**Kashou:** "Forgive me, Mentor... for following you like this."
**Beignet:** "Welcome, Shigure! ...I've been wanting to meet you!"
**Shigure:** "Ah... I feel the same way, Beignet-san. My brother has only talked about his mentor since returning home."
**Beignet:** "Oh? Is that so? Kashou was always talking about his little sister when he was in France."
**Kashou:** "Eh?! N-not at all...?"

reference_answer:
[Beignet]: 「Well, nothing much has changed.」
[Kashou]: 「Don't sell yourself short. These cakes are perfect, and they're the ultimate goal for me.」
[Kashou]: 「...I... tried to get dad to eat my cake.」
[Beignet]: 「I see... And how did that go?」
[Kashou]: 「Dad said 'he didn't need to eat it'.」
[Beignet]: 「...I see.」
[Kashou]: 「He also said that my cooking lacks a 'core'. I think he means a 'main part', like an 'axis' or a 'nucleus' in other things.」
It's hard trying to explain a concept I don't comprehend myself into French.
[Kashou]: 「Mentor... Will you allow me to train under you once again?」

**Kashou:** "Not at all. For me, this cake is still the perfect and ultimate goal."
**Kashou:** "...I... I wanted my father to eat the cake I made."

I'm guess there's something I'm missing.
Something dad and Mentor both understand.
However, it's not something that can be explained in words.
[Kashou]: 「Unghh...」
I find myself lost with my thoughts running around in circles in my head.
[Beignet]: 「I told you that I wouldn't do you any good, didn't I? Why not get back to Japan while you still can?」
[Kashou]: 「Oh, no! I cannot go back until I find something—anything.」
ModelAnswer:
**Kashou:** "That's what I think. My father is stubborn and not great with words, but... he's not the type to lie just because he doesn't want to admit something."  

**Beignet:** "The fact that he didn't explain it has meaning. You understand that?"  

**Kashou:** "Yes, probably."  

**Beignet:** "Then there's nothing I can teach you. Do you understand that too?"  

**Kashou:** "...Yes..."  
*Perhaps there’s something missing in me.*  
*My father and mentor understand it.*  
*But it's not something that can be explained with words.*  

**Kashou:** "Ugh..."  
*I'm troubled, and my thoughts are spinning in circles again.*  

**Beignet:** "Didn't I say I was useless? Should you return to your country now?"  

**Kashou:** "Ah, no! I can't go back until I find something."

Question:

[嘉祥]: 「強引なだけですよ」
[ベニエ]: 「強引さも、時と場合と言い方によっては、悪くないわ。たんに強制しても人は動かない。やる気にさせるのは、とても重要な資質よ」
[ベニエ]: 「一人の志ある者は川を渡れるけれど、皆に志を抱かせる者は、川に橋を作れるもの」
[嘉祥]: 「たしかに時雨は、橋を作らせるタイプかな」
[時雨]: 「兄様、一緒に映りましょう」
[嘉祥]: 「えっ！？　俺も……！？」
[時雨]: 「お客さまにフィアンセですかって訊かれちゃいました♪」
[嘉祥]: 「まさか、嘘を教えてないだろうな？」
reference_answer:
[Fraise]: 「L-Like this...?」
[Beignet]: 「Hehe... Fraise always gives you the runaround when it comes to stuff like that, but it seems like Shigure has the power to make people take action.」
[Kashou]: 「No, she is just pushy.」
[Beignet]: 「Being pushy isn't all that bad, depending on the situation. If that's all she was,  people wouldn't take action. Being able to motivate people is a valuable quality.」
[Beignet]: 「A single motivated person can cross a river, but a person who motivates many can build a bridge.」
[Kashou]: 「Yeah, maybe Shigure is the type to help build bridges.」
[Shigure]: 「Nii-sama, come join the photo.」
[Kashou]: 「Huh?! Me, too...?!」
[Shigure]: 「Our customer asked if you were my fiancé♪」
[Kashou]: 「You didn't feed her a lie, did you?」
ModelAnswer:
**Fraise:** "I-is this alright...?"
**Beignet:** "Hehe… Fraise, you've always avoided things like that. Shigure has a knack for making people take action."
**Kashou:** "It's just being forceful."
**Beignet:** "Forcefulness isn't bad, depending on the timing and how you phrase it. Simply forcing someone won’t make them move. Inspiring them to act is a crucial quality."
**Beignet:** "A person of ambition can cross a river alone, but one who inspires ambition in others can build a bridge across it."
**Kashou:** "Yeah, Shigure's definitely the type to get people building bridges."
**Shigure:** "Brother, let's take a picture together!"
**Kashou:** "Huh!? Me too...?"
**Shigure:** "Someone asked if you were my fiancé!♪"
**Kashou:** "Don't tell me you lied?"

reference_answer:

It's a fresh yet nostalgic taste.

[character] Name: Minaduki Kashou (水無月 嘉祥) | Gender: Male | Aliases: Master (ご主人さま)
[character] Name: Minaduki Shigure (水無月 時雨) | Gender: Female
[character] Name: Beignet (ベニエ) | Gender: Male | Aliases: Mentor (師匠)
Question:
[ベニエ]: 「……私は、嘉祥のお父さんではないから、わからないわね。そうかもしれないし、違うのかもしれない」
[ベニエ]: 「言葉というのは、言った本人にすら、本当の意味がわからないこともある」
[ベニエ]: 「１００人が受け取れば、１００通りの解釈があるのが、言葉というものだから」
[ベニエ]: 「大切なのは言葉ではなくて……」
[ベニエ]: 「いえ……少し話しすぎたわね」
[ベニエ]: 「長旅のうえに、ずっと働いて疲れたでしょう。シャワーを浴びて、早めに寝るといいわ」
[ベニエ]: 「あ……うっかりしていたわ。空き部屋はあるけれど、ベッドは嘉祥が使っていたものしか空いてないの」
[ベニエ]: 「一緒に使ってもらってもいいかしら？」
reference_answer:
[Beignet]: 「...I'm not your father, so I don't know. Your hunch could be right, or you it could be wrong.」
[Beignet]: 「There's also a chance that not even he himself knows the true meaning behind what he said.」
[Beignet]: 「Words are like that. You give them to a hundred different people, and they'll interpret them a hundred different ways.」
[Beignet]: 「What's important isn't the words. It's...」
[Beignet]: 「No... I've said too much.」
[Beignet]: 「The day's work on top of the long trip must have you tired, no? You should shower up and hurry to bed.」
[Beignet]: 「Oh... How silly of me to forget. There are empty rooms here, but the only one with a free bed is the one that Kashou used before.」
[Beignet]: 「Would the two of you mind sharing?」
ModelAnswer:
**BEIGNET**: "...I'm not Kashou's father, so I wouldn't know. It might be true, or it might not."  
**BEIGNET**: "Words can have meanings even the speaker doesn't fully understand."  
**BEIGNET**: "If a hundred people hear them, they'll each have their own interpretation—that's the nature of words."  
**BEIGNET**: "What matters isn't the words themselves..."  
**BEIGNET**: "...No... I've said too much."  
**BEIGNET**: "You must be tired after such a long journey and working so hard. Take a shower and get some rest early."  
**BEIGNET**: "Ah... I almost forgot. There's an empty room, but the only available bed is the one Kashou used to use."  
**BEIGNET**: "Would you mind sharing it?"

Question:
[ベニエ]: 「ダメよ。陽が落ちてから出歩くなんて、危ないもの」
[嘉祥]: 「そうだな。大きなベッドだから、大丈夫だろう」
[時雨]: 「…………えっ！？」
[嘉祥]: 「時雨が嫌なら、話は別だが」
[時雨]: 「は、はわ……はわわ……兄様と……！？」
[時雨]: 「うっ……私、幸せすぎて……気絶しそうです」
[ベニエ]: 「……本当に大丈夫なのよね、嘉祥？」
[嘉祥]: 「時雨はときどきこうなりますが、絶対に大丈夫です。俺を信用してください、師匠」
[ベニエ]: 「うふふ……なら、安心ね」
[ベニエ]: 「そうなの……時雨はこういう子なのね。会えてよかったわ」
reference_answer:
[Beignet]: 「That will not do. Walking around after sundown could be dangerous.」
[Kashou]: 「That's right. It's a big bed, so we'll manage.」
[Shigure]: 「...Huh?!」
[Kashou]: 「But if you don't want to, that's a different story.」
[Shigure]: 「H-Hah-wah.... Hah-wah-wah... With Nii-sama...?!」
[Shigure]: 「Urk... I am in such bliss... I think I might pass out.」
[Beignet]: 「...You're sure you'll be all right, Kashou?」
[Kashou]: 「Shigure just gets like this sometimes. I'm positive we'll be just fine. Please, believe me, Mentor.」
[Beignet]: 「Tee hee hee... One less worry, then.」
[Beignet]: 「I see... So, this is the type of girl Shigure is. I'm glad I've gotten to meet her.」
ModelAnswer:
**Beignet:** "No, no. It's dangerous to be out after sunset."
**Kashou:** "That's true. But it's a big bed, so she should be fine."
**Shigure:** "……Eh!?"
**Kashou:** "If Shigure doesn't want to, that's another story."
**Shigure:** "H-h-hah… hawawa… with Brother…!?"
**Shigure:** "Ugh… I'm too happy… I feel like I might faint."
**Beignet:** "……Are you really sure about this, Kashou?"
**Kashou:** "Shigure gets like this sometimes, but she'll definitely be fine. Please trust me, Mentor."
**Beignet:** "Fufu… then I'm relieved."
**Beignet:** "I see… so Shigure is this kind of girl. I'm glad to have met her."

metadata:
[character] Name: Minaduki Kashou (水無月 嘉祥) | Gender: Male | Aliases: Master (ご主人さま)
[character] Name: Beignet (ベニエ) | Gender: Male | Aliases: Mentor (師匠)
[character] Name: Minaduki Shigure (水無月 時雨) | Gender: Female
Question:
[時雨]: 「きっと頻繁に手を入れているのでしょうね。部屋は使わなければ、悪くなるものですから」
[嘉祥]: 「言われてみれば……」
[時雨]: 「毎日のように窓を開けたり、埃を払わないと、すぐカビ臭くなります」
[嘉祥]: 「そういうものか？」
[時雨]: 「実家にある兄様の部屋は、私が毎日のように手入れしていますから万全です」
[時雨]: 「窓を開けて、空気を入れ換えて、机を乾拭きし、ベッドの寝心地を確かめています」
[嘉祥]: 「そ、そうか」
ベッドの寝心地は、毎日チェックする必要が……？
[時雨]: 「たぶんベニエさんは、また兄様が来るのをずっと待っていたのだと思います」
[嘉祥]: 「そうか……」
reference_answer:
[Shigure]: 「I am to assume that she frequently tidies it up. Rooms are meant to be used, after all.」
[Kashou]: 「Now that you mention it...」
[Shigure]: 「Unless you open the windows and dust almost daily, the smell of mildew will instantly grow.」
[Kashou]: 「Is that how it works?」
[Shigure]: 「I tidy up your room back at home almost every day, so it is spotless.」
[Shigure]: 「I open the windows, air out the inside, wipe down your desk, and check the comfort levels of your bed.」
[Kashou]: 「O-Oh, I see.」
Is there a need for a daily check of my bed's comfort levels...?
[Shigure]: 「It might be that Beignet-san had been waiting for your return this entire time, Nii-sama.」
[Kashou]: 「Huh. Maybe...」
ModelAnswer:
**Shigure:** "You must be opening it often. A room left unused will quickly fall into disrepair."
**Kashou:** "Now that you mention it..."
**Shigure:** "Opening the window every day, dusting—otherwise, it'll get moldy in no time."
**Kashou:** "Is that how it is?"
**Shigure:** "My brother's room at home is perfectly maintained because I take care of it almost daily."
**Shigure:** "I open the windows to air it out, wipe down his desk, and check the comfort of the bed."
**Kashou:** "O-oh, really..."
Checking the bed's comfort every day...?
**Shigure:** "Beignet was probably waiting for you to come again, Master."
**Kashou:** "...I see."

[character] Name: Minaduki Shigure (水無月 時雨) | Gender: Female
Question:
[嘉祥]: 「明日も早い。シャワーを浴びて、もう寝るとしよう」
[時雨]: 「えっ、一緒にシャワーですか！？　そ、それは……こ、心の準備が……完了です」
[嘉祥]: 「そんなわけないだろ。早く浴びてきなさい」
[時雨]: 「はーい」
[時雨]: 「にゃ～お♪　にゃお？　にゃおぅん」
[嘉祥]: 「時雨が病気だ、すぐ病院へ」
[時雨]: 「すみません。嬉しすぎて、つい人語を忘れてしまいました」
[嘉祥]: 「まぁ、今日は、お疲れさまだったな」
[時雨]: 「もったいないお言葉です。私が勝手についてきたのに」
[嘉祥]: 「いいさ……俺だって勝手に来たんだ」
reference_answer:
[Kashou]: 「Tomorrow's another early day. Let's shower up and get to bed.」
[Shigure]: 「Huh? We're showering together?! W-Well... m-my body and mind... are ready.」
[Kashou]: 「Of course not together. Hurry and take yours first.」
[Shigure]: 「Right away!」
[Shigure]: 「Nya~oh♪ Nyaoh? Nya-ohm.」
[Kashou]: 「Shigure, you're sick. You need a hospital ASAP.」
[Shigure]: 「My apologies. I am just so thrilled that I forgot human speech for a second.」
[Kashou]: 「Well, you did work hard today.」
[Shigure]: 「You are too kind. Especially considering I tagged along of my own accord.」
[Kashou]: 「Don't sweat it. I came here of my own accord too, so we're in the same boat.」
ModelAnswer:
**Kashou:** "I have an early start tomorrow. I'm going to take a shower and then head to bed."
**Shigure:** "Eh, together in the shower!? W-well... that's... my heart is ready... complete."
**Kashou:** "Don't be ridiculous. Go take your shower quickly."
**Shigure:** "Okay~"
**Shigure:** "Nya~o♪ Nyao? Nyaoon."
**Kashou:** "Shigure, you're sick. We need to go to the hospital immediately."
**Shigure:** "I'm sorry. I was just so happy that I momentarily forgot how to speak human."
**Kashou:** "Well, good work today."
**Shigure:** "You honor me too much. It's not like I invited myself along."
**Kashou:** "It's fine... I came without permission too."

Question:

[嘉祥]: 「……シナモンのは、ちょっと違うかな」

[嘉祥]: 「だからこそ、いろいろな種類のケーキがあるわけで……」
