俺に見せ、味わわせるために、あれを……
reference_answer:
[Cinnamon]: 「Th-They make love to one another~ and once they squish and slosh... squish and slosh, they make a baby, you see...? Haaah... Mm!」
[Kashou]: 「...Okay, Cinnamon's the odd cat out.」
[Shigure]: 「Hm? Is something the matter, Nii-sama?」
[Kashou]: 「Oh, no... Just thinking to myself.」
[Kashou]: 「Everyone's personalities are different, but Mentor's cakes bring smiles to everyone's faces...」
[Kashou]: 「That is why she has so many varieties of cakes...」
[Kashou]: 「Then, what if she makes a cake for one person...?」
[Shigure]: 「...Didn't she cook tonight's dessert for you, Nii-sama?」
[Kashou]: 「Oh, you might be onto something.」
She made all that to present for me to taste...
ModelAnswer:
**Cinnamon:** "Ah, love each other~, squishy squishy... When you get all squishy squishy, that's how babies are made, y'know? Hahh... mmm."
**Kashou:** "...Cinnamon's explanation is a bit off, I think."
**Shigure:** "Hmm? What's wrong, Brother?"
**Kashou:** "Ah, no... just thinking about something."
**Kashou:** "Everyone has their own personality. But Master's cakes bring joy to everyone..."
**Kashou:** "That's why there are so many different kinds of cakes..."
**Kashou:** "So, if Master were to make a cake for one person specifically…?"
**Shigure:** "...Wasn't today's dessert made especially for you, Brother?"
**Kashou:** "Ah... maybe it was."
To show me, to let me taste it, that thing...

(Note: The onomatopoeia 'ぐちょんぐちょん' is transliterated as 'squishy squishy' to maintain the playful and childlike tone of Cinnamon's dialogue. The honorific '-様' for Master is kept as 'Master' as it is a common practice in English translations of visual novels.)

Question:

reference_answer:
[Shigure]: 「...I love seeing you when you're locked in thought, Nii-sama.」
[Shigure]: 「Hah... Hah.. Nii-sama, are you already asleep?」
[Kashou]: 「...Uh, no, not yet.」
[Shigure]: 「...Maple told me that you've had trouble sleeping recently.」
[Kashou]: 「Yeah, I end up lost in my thoughts when I'm by myself.」
[Shigure]: 「But you aren't alone right now.」
[Kashou]: 「Yeah, I know.」
[Shigure]: 「You have me. You also have Beignet-san, Fraise, and the other catgirls as well.」
[Kashou]: 「...Speaking of which, I wonder how they're all doing.」
[Shigure]: 「Perhaps I should have employed a pet-sitter after all.」
ModelAnswer:

**Shigure:** "Haa... haa... Brother, are you already asleep?"  
**Kashou:** "...No, not yet."  
**Shigure:** "...Maple told me you've been having trouble sleeping lately."  
**Kashou:** "Yeah. When I'm alone, I end up thinking about a lot of things."  
**Shigure:** "But you're not alone right now, are you?"  
**Kashou:** "Ah... I know."  
**Shigure:** "I'm here. And Beignet-san, Fraise too... The cats are waiting for you, you know?"  
**Kashou:** "...Come to think of it, how are the cats doing?"  
**Shigure:** "Should we have hired a pet sitter after all?"

Question:
[嘉祥]: 「そ、そうだけど……」

reference_answer:
[Kashou]: 「W-Well, yeah, but...」

[Kashou]: 「Uh, yes.」
[Shigure]: 「And you're telling me that you wouldn't share your bed with any of them?」
[Kashou]: 「No, I mean, it's not like it's off-limits, but we all just wanna sleep in peace when night rolls around, right?」
[Shigure]: 「Late night or early morning, I do not care...!」

[Shigure]: 「...Well, I wish I was a catgirl.」
[Kashou]: 「You're you, Shigure. My precious little sister.」
[Shigure]: 「True. If I were a catgirl, then I wouldn't be your sibling...」
[Shigure]: 「Gasp! Maybe you should be the catBOY instead!」
ModelAnswer:

**Shigure:** "And all six of them!"
**Kashou:** "Ah, yes."
**Shigure:** "Even so, you won't allow me to share a bed with them?"
**Kashou:** "No, it's not that I'm forbidding it, but we both want to sleep soundly at night, right?"
**Shigure:** "I wouldn't mind whether it's late at night or early in the morning...!"
**Kashou:** "If Shigure were a cat, things would have been different."
**Shigure:** "...I wish I *were* a cat."

**Shigure:** "Indeed. If I were a cat, then Master and I wouldn't be siblings..."
**Shigure:** "Hah! Perhaps it would have been better if *you* were a cat too, Brother!?"
**Kashou:** "...That's not really the point."

時雨は起き上がり、乱れた寝間着を直すと、よろよろとシャワー室へ歩いていった。
reference_answer:
[Shigure]: 「Hah, hah... Oh, Nii-sama...」
[Kashou]: 「What happened, Shigure?! Did you catch a cold?!」
[Shigure]: 「I-I'll be fine... You were just... too much to handle, Nii-sama...」
[Kashou]: 「I don't think I did anything to you, but YOU didn't do anything, did you?」

[Kashou]: 「In any case, why don't you hop in the shower? You're dripping with sweat, and the sheets are soaking wet.」

Shigure rises up, fixes her disheveled pajamas, and staggers her way to the shower room.
ModelAnswer:
**Shigure:** "Haa... haa... Oh, Brother..."
**Kashou:** "What's wrong, Shigure!? Did you catch a cold or something!?"
**Shigure:** "I-I'm fine... It's just... You were too much for me, Brother..."
**Kashou:** "I don't think I did anything... Right? You didn't do anything either, did you?"
**Shigure:** "...Yes. Nothing from my side... Not a single finger touched you."
**Kashou:** "Well then, how about taking a shower? You're drenched in sweat. The sheets are soaked."
**Shigure:** "I'm glad it was just sweat... I almost turned someone's bed into a prop from a splatter movie."
**Kashou:** "A nosebleed?"
Shigure got up, straightened her disheveled pajamas, and staggered towards the shower room.

[Beignet]: 「Good morning, Kashou, Shigure. Did you both sleep well?」

[Shigure]: 「...By the way, Beignet-san... There is something I would like to ask you.」

**Beignet:** "Good morning, Kashou, Shigure. Did you sleep well?"

**Kashou:** "Yes! Thanks to that, my head feels clear!"

**Shigure:** "...The world has changed its colors, all things shine, and I feel reborn."

**Shigure:** "Of course, I'm fine, Fraise."

**Kashou:** "Then, I'll too—"

**Beignet:** "Kashou, I want you to help Fraise with opening preparations."

reference_answer:
[Kashou]: 「I've been in this line of work for much longer, but you're way more diligent than I'll ever be.」
[Fraise]: 「You put painstaking detail into your work. I'd like to learn by your example.」
[Kashou]: 「Really?」
[Fraise]: 「Granted, I oftentimes see you space out...」
[Kashou]: 「Urk...」
[Fraise]: 「You have a lot of things on your mind that you need to sort out at the moment, right, Kashou-san?」
[Fraise]: 「Pâtissière told me some of the details.」
[Kashou]: 「Yeah, but that's still no reason to space out in the middle of work.」
[Fraise]: 「I will work to pick up the slack.」
[Kashou]: 「I'm not sure what I should say...」
I feel somewhere between apologetic and pathetic. Of course, I'm more grateful than anything, but that goes without saying.
ModelAnswer:
**Kashou:** "Even though I've been working here longer, Fraise is surprisingly more efficient."
**Fraise:** "Kashou-san is meticulous with the details. I admire that."
**Kashou:** "Really?"
**Fraise:** "Though you do space out sometimes..."
**Kashou:** "Ugh..."
**Fraise:** "Right now, Kashou-san must be troubled and have a lot to think about..."
**Fraise:** "I heard a little from the pastry chef."
**Kashou:** "That doesn't excuse me for spacing out at work, though."
**Fraise:** "I'll make up for it by working harder."
**Kashou:** "What can I even say...?"
It's a mix of apologetic and pathetic feelings. But more than anything, I'm grateful.

(Note: The translation strictly follows the dialogue format rule with speaker names and preserves honorifics as requested.)

[Kashou]: 「Oh, no. Just a little trip down memory lane.」
[Kashou]: 「Actually, I lived together with you, Fraise, albeit for just a short while.」
[Kashou]: 「You were a super small kitten back then, and it was a really short time, so I don't think you remember.」
[Kashou]: 「You've been smart ever since you were a kid.」

[Fraise]: 「I'm sorry. I realized right when we met, but...」
[Kashou]: 「Dang, you should have told me.」
[Fraise]: 「Well, you seemed to have more pressing matters to attend to...」
[Fraise]: 「I just remember; that's all.」

**Kashou**: "No… I was just remembering something from a long time ago."
**Kashou**: "Actually, for a short while, Fraise and I lived together."
**Kashou**: "You were such a tiny kitten back then, and it was only for a very brief period, so I don't think you remember."

reference_answer:
[Fraise]: 「I've always looked up to you... and helped out in the shop because of that.」
[Beignet]: 「Then, once she became the catgirl here, she would always say she wanted to help out around shop and even made her name Fraise.」
[Kashou]: 「If memory serves, a catgirl picks their name when they're three months old, so that's when she came here, huh?」
[Fraise]: 「I know you're really busy right now, so... I decided that I wouldn't say anything about me.」
[Fraise]: 「But now that I've eaten the macaron I've dreamed about... I just couldn't control myself any longer...」
[Shigure]: 「It's fine, Fraise. You needn't contain yourself so badly. Nii-sama understands.」
[Kashou]: 「Yeah, of course. Thank you so much for remembering, Fraise.」
[Kashou]: 「Also, I appreciate you helping out Mentor in such big ways as well.」
ModelAnswer:
**FRAISE:** "I admired my older brother… and helped out at the shop."
**BEIGNET:** "So you became our shop cat, saying you wanted to help forever, and even changed your name to Fraise?"
**KASHOU:** "I thought cats were named around three months old. Is that where it came from…?"
**FRAISE:** "My older brother is going through a tough time right now… I was trying not to say anything about myself."
**FRAISE:** "But after eating the macarons I'd always dreamed of… I couldn't hold back anymore…"
**SHIGURE:** "It's okay, Fraise. You don't have to hold back so much; my brother understands."
**KASHOU:** "Yeah, of course. Thanks for remembering, Fraise."
**KASHOU:** "And thanks to you too, Mentor. I appreciate all your help."

**Shigure:** "Right now, you'll even get a special bonus: a sleeping face broomide of my brother!"
**Fraise:** "Eh? What do you mean by 'sleeping face'…?"
**Kashou:** "Hey, Shigure…?"
**Beignet:** "Hehe…"

metadata:
[character] Name: Minaduki Kashou (水無月 嘉祥) | Gender: Male | Aliases: Master (ご主人さま)
[character] Name: Fraise (フレーズ) | Gender: Female
[character] Name: Minaduki Shigure (水無月 時雨) | Gender: Female
Question:
[フレーズ]: 「大変です、お兄さん！　外に行列が……！」
[嘉祥]: 「おお……昨日に増して、すごいお客さんの数になってるな。まるで、クリスマスじゃないか」
[時雨]: 「元から知る人ぞ知る名店でしたが、ＳＮＳでさらに火が点いたのですね」
[嘉祥]: 「人事みたいに言うな」
[時雨]: 「すみません。まさか、ここまでの効果があるとは」
[フレーズ]: 「時雨さん……やりすぎだと思います」
[時雨]: 「なにを言っているんですか、フレーズ？　私だけが理由では、ありませんよ」
[時雨]: 「あなたのことも、とっても話題になっています。ほら！　ここにも、ほら！」
時雨が突き出したスマホには、フレーズを賞讃する言葉が並んでいた。
会いに行く、と宣言しているお客さんが何人もいる。おそらく、店の前にできた行列の中に……
reference_answer:
[Fraise]: 「Big trouble, Onii-san! There is a line outside...!」
[Kashou]: 「Ooh, we've got even more customers than we did yesterday. It's looking a lot like Christmas over here.」
[Shigure]: 「This shop has always been a popular spot among those in the know, but the social media presence seems to have sparked a bigger flame.」
[Kashou]: 「Don't talk like you didn't start it.」
[Shigure]: 「My apologies. I never thought that it would prove this effective.」
[Fraise]: 「Shigure-san... I think you may have overdid it.」
[Shigure]: 「What are you even saying, Fraise? I am not the only cause here.」
[Shigure]: 「You have become the hot topic yourself. Look! Right here, see?」
Shigure holds out her cellphone to reveal a line of comments praising Fraise.
There are even some customers stating they're explicitly coming to see her. Most likely standing in that line outside the shop...
ModelAnswer:
[Fraise]: "This is terrible, Master! There's a line outside…!"
[Kashou]: "Whoa... Even more customers than yesterday. It's like Christmas."
[Shigure]: "It was already a hidden gem known to connoisseurs, but the SNS posts really lit it up."
[Kashou]: "Don't say it like it's someone else's problem."
[Shigure]: "I'm sorry. I didn't realize it would have this much of an effect."
[Fraise]: "Shigure-san… I think you went too far."
[Shigure]: "What are you saying, Fraise? It's not just because of me, you know?"
[Shigure]: "You're also a hot topic. Look! And here!"
Shigure held out her phone, showing words praising Fraise.
Many customers had declared they were coming to see her. Probably among the crowd lined up in front of the shop…

---

**Translation Notes:**
- **Honorifics:** Kept "-san" for Shigure and Fraise as appropriate. "Master" (ご主人さま) is directly translated.
- **Onomatopoeia:** None present, so no transliteration needed.
- **Dialogue Format:** Followed strict `SPEAKER_NAME: "DIALOGUE"` structure.
- **No Commentary:** No additional explanations or dialogue tags included.

[フレーズ]: 「……カメラ、こわいです」
reference_answer:
[Fraise]: 「N-No way! I can't! I don't like that... I don't like being the center of attention!」
[Shigure]: 「Everyone is like that at first. You will come to like it in time.」
[Fraise]: 「I don't think I'd like turning out like you, Shigure-san...」
[Shigure]: 「Fraise...?」
[Kashou]: 「Shigure, Fraise, save the chit-chat for later. Let's get working so we don't keep these customers waiting!」
[Shigure]: 「R-Right!」
[Fraise]: 「...Very well, Onii-san. I'll do my best!」
[Beignet]: 「Sorry. We're all out of ingredients.」
[Kashou]: 「Guess we'll have to close up shop for today, then.」
[Shigure]: 「It turned into more of a photo session toward the end.」
[Fraise]: 「...Cameras are scary.」

**Fraise:** "N-no way! I can't do it! I'm not good at... standing out, you know?"
**Shigure:** "Everyone feels that way at first. You'll get used to it eventually."
**Fraise:** "But if I end up like Shigure-san..."
**Shigure:** "Fraise...?"
**Kashou:** "Shigure, Fraise, no more chatter! Let's work hard so we don't keep the customers waiting!"
**Shigure:** "Y-yes!"
**Fraise:** "...Okay, Oniisan. I'll do my best!"
**Beignet:** "I'm sorry, but we're out of ingredients."
**Kashou:** "Looks like we have no choice but to close up shop for today."
**Shigure:** "The last customers were acting like they were at a photoshoot."
**Fraise:** "...Cameras are scary."

As they clean, Fraise addresses Shigure.

metadata:
[character] Name: Minaduki Kashou (水無月 嘉祥) | Gender: Male | Aliases: Master (ご主人さま)
[character] Name: Beignet (ベニエ) | Gender: Male | Aliases: Mentor (師匠)
[character] Name: Fraise (フレーズ) | Gender: Female
[character] Name: Minaduki Shigure (水無月 時雨) | Gender: Female
Question:
[時雨]: 「間違いありません。話題になったことで大勢が情報を調べ、名店という評価が多かったからこそ。相乗効果です」
[嘉祥]: 「俺としては、師匠の素晴らしいケーキをより多くの人が知ってくれたから、嬉しいけど」
[フレーズ]: 「ううぅ……明日もこの調子だと、ちょっと大変かもしれません」
[ベニエ]: 「今日が特別だったのよ、きっと」
[ベニエ]: 「今日みたいな行列は、明日はないと思うわ」
[フレーズ]: 「そうですよね……明日は、またパティシエールとわたしだけになりますから」
俺たちは、今夜には発つ予定だった。フランスと日本の時差は７時間。約束の３日間で帰宅するには、そのくらいの時間に出なくては。
結局、俺は自分に足りないものが、まだわからないでいた。
気持ち的には、だいぶ楽になったのだが……
reference_answer:
[Shigure]: 「That is absolutely right. The shop becoming a hot topic led to a majority of people looking into information, which led to a lot of rave reviews. It's synergy.」
[Kashou]: 「Personally, I'm glad that a lot of people know about your incredible cakes, Mentor.」
[Fraise]: 「Unghhh... If tomorrow is like it was today, then we might have more than a little problem.」
[Beignet]: 「I'm sure that today was just a special case.」
[Beignet]: 「I don't think we'll have lines out the door again tomorrow.」
[Fraise]: 「Right... Tomorrow will just be Pâtissière and me.」
We both have plans to depart tonight. There's a seven hour time difference between France and Japan, so we need to leave by then in order to make it back home when I promised.
In the end, I still don't know what it is I'm missing.
I feel a lot better mentally, though...
ModelAnswer:
[Shigure]: "There's no mistake. Because of the buzz, a large number of people looked into it, and because there were so many positive reviews calling it a renowned shop, it was a snowball effect."
[Kashou]: "Personally, I'm just happy that more people got to know about Mentor's amazing cakes."
[Fraise]: "Ugh… If tomorrow is anything like today, it might be a bit tough."
[Beignet]: "Today was special, surely."
[Beignet]: "There won't be lines like this one tomorrow, I think."
[Fraise]: "That's right... Tomorrow, it'll just be the pastry chef and me again."

We were scheduled to depart tonight. The time difference between France and Japan is seven hours. To make it back home in the agreed three days, we had to leave around that time.

In the end, I still didn't know what was missing in myself.
Even though my heart felt much lighter…

metadata:
[character] Name: Beignet (ベニエ) | Gender: Male | Aliases: Mentor (師匠)
[character] Name: Minaduki Kashou (水無月 嘉祥) | Gender: Male | Aliases: Master (ご主人さま)
Question:
[嘉祥]: 「あ、すみません……」
[ベニエ]: 「結局、お役に立てなかったわね」
[嘉祥]: 「いや、そんなことは！」
[嘉祥]: 「あ……まぁ……まだ、父親の言う芯ってのは、よくわかっていません」
[嘉祥]: 「でも、この場所へ来て、お店を手伝って、思い出しました」
[嘉祥]: 「俺は、やっぱり、皆を笑顔にするケーキが作りたい」
[嘉祥]: 「師匠の作るケーキは、本当に美味しくて、優しい味で……皆を笑顔にしてくれるんです」
[ベニエ]: 「……ありがとう。そう言ってもらえて、嬉しいわ」
[嘉祥]: 「俺は、なんだか、いろいろと考えすぎて……最初の気持ちを忘れていたというか……」
[嘉祥]: 「口では目指していると言いつつ、別のことに捕らわれていたように思います」
reference_answer:
[Kashou]: 「Oh, my apologies...」
[Beignet]: 「Looks like I wasn't able to help after all.」
[Kashou]: 「No, that's not true!」
[Kashou]: 「Eh. Well... I'm just still lost on what my father meant by a 'core'.」
[Kashou]: 「But after coming here and helping in the shop, I remembered something.」
[Kashou]: 「I really do want to make cakes that bring smiles to everyone's faces.」
[Kashou]: 「Mentor, your cakes are so good and have such a gentle flavor... that they bring smiles to people's faces.」
[Beignet]: 「...Thank you. It warms my heart to hear you say that.」
[Kashou]: 「It's sort of like I've been thinking of so much... I've lost sight of my initial focus...」
[Kashou]: 「I may have said that was my goal, but I was trapped by something else.」
ModelAnswer:
**Kashou:** "Ah, I'm sorry..."
**Beignet:** "In the end, I wasn't much help, was I?"
**Kashou:** "No, that's not true!"
**Kashou:** "Well... I still don't fully understand what my father meant by 'core'."
**Kashou:** "But coming here and helping out at the shop reminded me."
**Kashou:** "I really want to make cakes that bring smiles to people's faces."
**Kashou:** "Your cakes, Master Beignet, are so delicious and kind... they truly make everyone happy."
**Beignet:** "...Thank you. I'm glad to hear you say that."
**Kashou:** "I think I was overthinking things... or rather, I'd forgotten my original feelings..."
**Kashou:** "Even though I said I was aiming for it, I feel like I got caught up in other things."

metadata:
[character] Name: Beignet (ベニエ) | Gender: Male | Aliases: Mentor (師匠)
[character] Name: Minaduki Kashou (水無月 嘉祥) | Gender: Male | Aliases: Master (ご主人さま)
Question:
[ベニエ]: 「前にも言ったとおり、嘉祥のお父さんの真意はわからないけれど、私は貴方のことを応援しているわ」
[嘉祥]: 「ありがとうございます」
[嘉祥]: 「そういえば、俺がケーキを作る理由は、何度も話しているけれど……師匠のことは聞いたことがないですよね」
[ベニエ]: 「……そうね」
[嘉祥]: 「いや、前に聞いたときは、ケーキを作る理由は、私がパティシエールだからって答えられたんですけど……」
[ベニエ]: 「ふふ……そうだったかしら？」
[嘉祥]: 「それなら、パティシエールになった理由は、どうなんでしょうか？」
[ベニエ]: 「……この店は……私の祖母の代からのもので、ずっとケーキを作ってきたの」
[ベニエ]: 「嘉祥の家ほどではないけれど、守るべき伝統があると思っているわ」
reference_answer:
[Beignet]: 「Just as I've said before, I don't know what your father meant, but I support you, regardless.」
[Kashou]: 「Thank you very much.」
[Kashou]: 「Speaking of which, I've talked about my reasons for cake-making plenty of times, but... you've never talked about yours, have you, Mentor?」
[Beignet]: 「...That's right.」
[Kashou]: 「Well, when I asked you in the past, I remember you answered, 'I make cakes because I'm a pâtissière', but...」
[Beignet]: 「Hehe... Did I now?」
[Kashou]: 「In that case, what about your reasons for being a pâtissière in the first place?」
[Beignet]: 「...This pâtissièrie... has been making cakes since my grandmother's generation.」
[Beignet]: 「And while not to the extent of your family, I do think that it has a tradition that needs to be protected.」
ModelAnswer:
**Beignet:** "As I said before, I don't know your father's true intentions, but I'm rooting for you."
**Kashou:** "Thank you."
**Kashou:** "Speaking of which, I've talked about why I make cakes many times… but I haven't heard anything about *you*, Mentor."
**Beignet:** "...That's right."
**Kashou:** "Well, when I asked before, the reason I gave for making cakes was that I'm a pastry chef..."
**Beignet:** "Hehe... is that so?"
**Kashou:** "Then, what about the reason *you* became a pastry chef?"
**Beignet:** "...This shop has been in my family since my grandmother's time. We've always made cakes."
**Beignet:** "Not as much as your family, but I believe there are traditions worth protecting."

metadata:

洋菓子を教えてもらうために弟子入りするのに、実家の和菓子屋が老舗だという話は、場違いな気がして避けていたのだが……
[ベニエ]: 「それは……」

[嘉祥]: 「そうだったんですね。あっ、余計な話をして、すみません。このラ・ソレイユに伝統があるという話でしたよね」
reference_answer:
[Kashou]: 「Hm? Huh? I... did say that my family owned a Japanese pastry shop, but did I ever mention that they had a history?」
I became her apprentice to learn Western pastry making, so I avoided mentioning my parents owning a long-standing Japanese pastry shop to make things simpler...
[Beignet]: 「Well...」
[Shigure]: 「My apologies, Nii-sama! I told her this morning!」

[Kashou]: 「No, it's all good. I wasn't trying to keep it a secret.」
[Beignet]: 「Yes... Shigure told me about your situation.」
[Kashou]: 「So, that's how you know. Oh, I'm sorry for cutting you off. You were saying something about the tradition of La Soleil?」
ModelAnswer:
**Kashou:** "Huh? Wait, I mentioned my family runs a wagashi shop, but did I ever say it was such an old and established place?"  

I avoided bringing it up when apprenticing to learn Western sweets because it felt out of place…  
**Beignet:** "Well..."  
**Shigure:** "Forgive me, Brother! I thought you should know the situation this morning."  
**Kashou:** "Eh?"  
**Shigure:** "I believed you needed to be aware of your circumstances. It was presumptuous of me…"  
**Kashou:** "No, it's fine. I wasn’t hiding anything."  
**Beignet:** "Yes… Shigure explained everything to me."  
**Kashou:** "I see. Sorry for the tangent. You were saying La Soleil has a history?"

[Beignet]: 「Yes, back when I was still young...」

**Kashou:** "So, Mentor's reason for making sweets is to preserve the flavors passed down from your grandmother?"  
**Beignet:** "Well… yes, something like that..."  
**Beignet:** "No, that’s not right."  
**Beignet:** "The real reason I still make Western confectionery is probably… lingering feelings…"  
**Kashou:** "Lingering feelings...?"  

**Fraise:** "Pastry chef..."  
Judging from Fraise's reaction, she seemed to know the situation.  

**Beignet:** "The reason I keep making sweets is… because of my son whom I abandoned long ago."  
**Kashou:** "I had heard you had a son, but..."

Question:
[ベニエ]: 「私たちは結婚して、息子が生まれて……しばらくは３人で暮らしていたの」
[ベニエ]: 「その頃にね……私の作ったお菓子が、皆を笑顔にする、と息子が言ったのよ」
[ベニエ]: 「息子がママはお日様みたいだねと言ってくれた」
[ベニエ]: 「この店の名前をラ・ソレイユにしたのは、その言葉があってのことなの」
[嘉祥]: 「なるほど、そういう由来が……」
ようやくラ・ソレイユの由来が聞けて、俺は嬉しかった。
しかし、ただ幸せなだけの話ではないようだった。
[時雨]: 「……ご子息を……ご家族を愛していたのですね」
[ベニエ]: 「ええ、それはもう」
[ベニエ]: 「でも、私は日本を去らなければならなくなったの」
[ベニエ]: 「この店を継ぐ予定だった兄が、早世してしまって……」
reference_answer:
[Beignet]: 「We married, and I gave birth to a son... For a while, the three of us lived together.」
[Beignet]: 「When we did... my son told me that... my sweets put a smile on everyone's face.」
[Beignet]: 「He told me, 'Mama, you're just like the sun'.」
[Beignet]: 「The reason why I named this shop 'La Soleil' is because of my son's words.」
[Kashou]: 「I see. So that's why...」
It fills me with joy to finally find out the origin behind the name La Soleil.
However, this story doesn't seem to be leading toward a happy ever after.
[Shigure]: 「...You loved your son... You loved your family, yes?」
[Beignet]: 「Yes, that goes without saying.」
[Beignet]: 「However, I was forced to leave Japan.」
[Beignet]: 「My older brother, who was supposed to take over this pâtissièrie, died an early death...」
ModelAnswer:
**Beignet:** "We got married, had a son… and lived together as a family of three for a while."  

**Beignet:** "Around that time… my son told me that the sweets I made brought smiles to everyone’s faces."  

**Beignet:** "He said his mom was like the sun."  

**Beignet:** "That’s why I named this shop La Soleil—because of those words."  

**Kashou:** "I see… so that’s the origin of the name."  

I was happy to finally hear the story behind La Soleil. But it seemed there was more to the story than just happiness.  

**Shigure:** "...You loved your son... your family very much, didn’t you?"  

**Beignet:** "Yes, dearly."  

**Beignet:** "But I had to leave Japan."  

**Beignet:** "My brother, who was supposed to take over the shop, passed away prematurely..."

Question:
[嘉祥]: 「そんなことがあったなんて……」
[ベニエ]: 「あの頃の私は、まだ若くて、賢明ではなかったわね。いくつものことを追いかけて……」
[ベニエ]: 「失ったあとに、何が一番大切だったのか、気付いたもの」
[フレーズ]: 「家族が……一番だったのですか？」
[ベニエ]: 「そうね……私にとっての、お菓子は……息子が笑顔になってくれるものだった」
[ベニエ]: 「私が作っているお菓子は、幼い息子が美味しいと褒めてくれた味なのよ」
[ベニエ]: 「今も作り続けているのは、いつかまた息子が食べて喜んでくれるかもしれない、と思って」
[ベニエ]: 「……そういう、未練なのよ」
[嘉祥]: 「あの……ご家族は、今は……？」
下宿させてもらって、毎日のように店を手伝っていたが、電話も郵便も、家族らしき者から連絡が来たことはなかった。
reference_answer:
[Kashou]: 「I can't believe that's what happened...」
[Beignet]: 「I was still young back then and not wise. I tried chasing after a lot of things...」
[Beignet]: 「After I lost it all, I realized what was truly precious to me.」
[Fraise]: 「Was it... family?」
[Beignet]: 「Yes... To me, my pastries were always... something that brought a smile to my son's face.」
[Beignet]: 「The pastries I make are imbued with the flavor that my young son complimented me for.」
[Beignet]: 「I think that I still make them to this day on the off-chance that my son might eat them in joy one day.」
[Beignet]: 「...That is the regret I speak of.」
[Kashou]: 「Um... Where is your family now...?」
I lodged here with Mentor's permission and helped in the shop each day, but I don't remember a single phone call, package, or message from anyone even resembling family.
ModelAnswer:
**Minaduki Kashou:** "To think something like that happened..."
**Beignet:** "Back then, I was still young and not very wise. Chasing after so many things..."
**Beignet:** "...I realized what was most important to me only after losing it."
**Fraise:** "Family... was the most important thing?"
**Beignet:** "That's right... For me, sweets were... something that made my son smile."
**Beignet:** "The taste of the sweets I make is the one my young son praised as delicious."
**Beignet:** "I keep making them now because I think he might eat them again someday and be happy."
**Beignet:** "...That's what you call lingering attachment, I suppose."
**Minaduki Kashou:** "Um... What about your family now...?"
(I was lodging with her and helping out at the shop almost every day, but neither phone calls nor letters came from anyone who seemed to be family.)

**Minaduki Kashou:** “Um… what about your family now…?”

Question:
[ベニエ]: 「歳を取ってから、ようやく息子の気持ちを考えることができるようになったなんてね……」
[嘉祥]: 「気持ちを考える……」

reference_answer:
[Beignet]: 「To think that I finally managed to consider my son's feelings after growing old...」
[Kashou]: 「Considering his feelings...」
[Shigure]: 「No matter how old I would get, I would want to meet my mother.」
[Fraise]: 「I don't think age matters here, Pâtissière.」
[Kashou]: 「Well, I... couldn't consider what you did at the time as a mistake.」
[Kashou]: 「I mean, if you had remained in Japan and hadn't resumed business as a patissiere here, I wouldn't have ever encountered such wonderful Western pastries.」
[Beignet]: 「...I suppose that is one way of thinking about it.」
[Fraise]: 「I-I agree! If you weren't around, Pâtissière, then we wouldn't...」
[Beignet]: 「That's true. We probably wouldn't have ever met.」
ModelAnswer:

**Kashou:** "Understand his feelings..."
**Shigure:** "No matter how old I get, I want to see Mother."
**Fraise:** "I don't think age matters, Pastry Chef."
**Kashou:** "I still... I can't believe my mentor simply made a mistake back then."
**Kashou:** "Because if he hadn't stayed in Japan and reopened his patisserie here, I wouldn't have encountered such wonderful Western sweets."
**Beignet:** "...That's one way to look at it."
**Fraise:** "M-Me too! If you weren't a Pastry Chef, I might not be..."
**Beignet:** "True. You might never have met Fraise."

reference_answer:

[Beignet]: 「...Yes, thankfully.」
[Kashou]: 「I don't think  what you did in the past was a mistake, but I do think it's a fact that you couldn't take your son's feelings into consideration at the time.」
[Kashou]: 「Still, if your son is an adult now, I'm pretty sure that he's considering how you must've felt, too.」
[Beignet]: 「Isn't that just convenient wishful thinking?」
[Kashou]: 「Perhaps, but nothing is certain, which is why... I think you should give your son a visit.」
[Kashou]: 「I apologize for speaking outside my boundaries.」

ModelAnswer:

**Beignet:** "...I'm grateful for that."

**Kashou:** "But if his son is an adult now, maybe he'll understand the Mentor's feelings too."
**Beignet:** "Isn't that just wishful thinking on my part?"
**Kashou:** "Maybe. But we don't know until we try. That's why I think... I should meet with your son."
**Kashou:** "Sorry for saying this without asking first."
**Fraise:** "I agree with the young master, Pastry Chef."

The Mentor regrets being separated from his family.
I left home of my own accord and have become distant with my parents.

[Kashou]: 「This was a two-night trip by plane, which means it was roughly a one-night stay. You're packing quite the load for such a short time.」
[Shigure]: 「A girl needs many tools to keep up appearances.」
[Shigure]: 「Also, I couldn't just use the same shoes and underwear for this dress and kimono. I also needed loungewear, as well.」
[Shigure]: 「And I didn't research on how to use the French luggage delivery services.」
[Kashou]: 「Aah, I wouldn't put too much faith in getting your luggage delivered to the airport in France.」
[Shigure]: 「O-Oh, is that so?」
[Kashou]: 「Coming from personal experience... you're pretty much leaving it to chance.」
[Shigure]: 「Well, that sounds no good.」
ModelAnswer:
**Shigure:** "Ugh..."
Shigure is pulling a large suitcase. It looks quite heavy.
**Kashou:** "This time it's just a two-night trip by plane, so practically one night away? That's a lot of luggage?"
**Shigure:** "A woman needs all sorts of things for her appearance and accessories."
**Shigure:** "Besides, I can't exactly wear the same shoes and underwear with both this dress and the kimono. And I needed loungewear too."
**Shigure:** "I hadn't researched how to use French delivery services."
**Kashou:** "Ah... you might not want to rely on French delivery services too much."
**Shigure:** "R-Really?"
**Kashou:** "Based on personal experience, it depends a lot on luck, I think."
**Shigure:** "That's troublesome..."

metadata:
[character] Name: Minaduki Shigure (水無月 時雨) | Gender: Female
[character] Name: Minaduki Kashou (水無月 嘉祥) | Gender: Male | Aliases: Master (ご主人さま)
Question:
[嘉祥]: 「時雨、大変なら持ってあげるから、無理をする前に言ってくれよ？」
[時雨]: 「あ……」
[時雨]: 「兄様、ちょっと変わりましたね……」
[嘉祥]: 「えっ、重たい荷物を運んでいる妹を気遣うくらい、今までだってしただろ？」
[嘉祥]: 「そんなに薄情な人間ではなかったと思うぞ。むしろ、お節介なくらいで……」
[時雨]: 「はい。今も昔も、兄様はとっても優しくて、素敵です」
[時雨]: 「でも、以前なら、私の言葉を待つことなく、重そうだから持ってあげるよと言うかと思います」
[嘉祥]: 「そう、かな……？」
[時雨]: 「それはそれで、とても嬉しいことですし、私は感謝したと思いますが」
[時雨]: 「でも、今の兄様は、私に判断を任せてくれました」
reference_answer:
[Kashou]: 「Shigure, I can take that for you if it's too much, so just ask before you break your back.」
[Shigure]: 「Oh...」
[Shigure]: 「Nii-sama, I think you've changed a bit...」
[Kashou]: 「Huh? Looking out for my little sister carrying a bunch of heavy luggage isn't something new for me, is it?」
[Kashou]: 「I don't think that I've ever been THAT heartless before. Actually, I just might dote a little too much...」
[Shigure]: 「Yes. Past and present, you've always been a kind and wonderful person.」
[Shigure]: 「But, in the past, I feel as though you wouldn't wait for me to say anything and you would just say, 'Hey, that looks heavy; I'll take that off your hands'.」
[Kashou]: 「Oh, would I...?」
[Shigure]: 「That being the case, it's an extremely kind gesture, and I would appreciate it.」
[Shigure]: 「However, you seem to let me make the decision for myself now.」
ModelAnswer:
**Kashou:** "Shigure, if it's too much, just tell me and I'll carry it for you. Don't push yourself before saying something?"
**Shigure:** "..."
**Shigure:** "Brother, you've changed a little..."
**Kashou:** "Huh? I've always worried about my sister carrying heavy luggage, haven't I?"
**Kashou:** "I don't think I was *that* heartless. If anything, I was probably too meddlesome..."
**Shigure:** "Yes. Both now and then, you're very kind and wonderful."
**Shigure:** "But before, you would have said 'It looks heavy, let me carry it for you' without waiting for my words."
**Kashou:** "Is that so...?"
**Shigure:** "That was also something I was very happy about, and I would have been grateful."
**Shigure:** "But the current Brother has entrusted me with making that decision."

metadata:
[character] Name: Minaduki Shigure (水無月 時雨) | Gender: Female
[character] Name: Minaduki Kashou (水無月 嘉祥) | Gender: Male | Aliases: Master (ご主人さま)
Question:
[時雨]: 「きっと自覚はないのでしょう。ちょっとした変化です。兄様マニアの私でなければ、見逃してしまいますわ」
[嘉祥]: 「お、おう……」
俺自身のことなのに、妹のほうが把握しているというのも、どうかと思うが……
[時雨]: 「ここ数日のことだけでなく……きっと、これまでの日々の積み重ねが、兄様を変えたのでしょうね」
[嘉祥]: 「俺は何も変わったつもりはないけれど、時雨が言うのなら、変わったのかもしれない」
ネコたちと過ごした日々があって、師匠の言葉があって、今の俺が形作られているのだろう。
[嘉祥]: 「まぁ、師匠があれだけの話をしてくれたんだ。俺だって少しは学ぶさ」
[時雨]: 「学びはありましたか？」
[嘉祥]: 「たぶんな。俺も、自分が洋菓子を作る理由を考えてみたよ」
reference_answer:
[Shigure]: 「You probably don't realize it yourself since it's such a minor change. If I weren't such a Nii-sama fanatic, I would have overlooked it myself.」
[Kashou]: 「U-Uh, sure...」
Not sure how I feel about my sister being able to pick up on something about me better than... well, me.
[Shigure]: 「I'm sure that the past few days alone haven't changed you... but rather, the culmination of the days leading up until now have.」
[Kashou]: 「I don't really think I've changed any, but maybe I did if you say so.」
The days I spent with the girls, my mentor's words— all those things have probably helped shape the person I am now.
[Kashou]: 「Well, Mentor was willing to share that much of her story with me. I could learn a thing or two myself.」
[Shigure]: 「Were you able to learn anything?」
[Kashou]: 「Yeah, I think. I tried thinking of my own reasons for pastry-making.」
ModelAnswer:
**Shigure:** "I'm sure he isn't aware of it himself. It's just a slight change. Only someone like me, an older brother maniac, would notice."  

**Kashou:** "O-oh…"  
Even though I’m talking about myself, it’s strange that my younger sister knows better than I do...  

**Shigure:** "Not just these past few days… but surely, the accumulation of all those days has changed you, Brother."  

**Kashou:** "I don’t think I’ve changed at all, but if Shigure says so, maybe I have."  
Spending time with the cats, and Master’s words—those must be shaping me into who I am now.  

**Kashou:** "Well, after Master gave me that whole lecture, I guess I learned something."  

**Shigure:** "Did you learn anything?"  

**Kashou:** "Maybe. I’ve been thinking about why *I* make Western sweets in the first place."

[character] Name: Minaduki Shigure (水無月 時雨) | Gender: Female
Question:
[嘉祥]: 「それが言葉だけだったんじゃないか、と思ってな」
[時雨]: 「そんな！　言葉だけなんてこと……」
[嘉祥]: 「いや、本当の心の奥底にある理由を……俺は自分自身の気持ちを、深く考えてみたんだ」
[嘉祥]: 「結局のところ、俺は……親父に認められたいんだ」
[嘉祥]: 「いい歳して、反抗期なんじゃないか？」
[嘉祥]: 「俺は、承認欲求に満ちたエゴイストなんだろう、きっと」
[嘉祥]: 「すまないな、時雨……幻滅させたかな……？」
[時雨]: 「それが、兄様が洋菓子を作っている理由なんですか？」
[嘉祥]: 「そうじゃなければ、親父に否定されたくらいで、こんなにも悩んだりはしないだろう」
[時雨]: 「もしかしたら、そういう気持ちはあるのかもしれません」
reference_answer:
[Kashou]: 「Yeah, I'm starting to think those were just words.」
[Shigure]: 「No way! No way they're just words...」
[Kashou]: 「No, I mean the real reason deep in my heart... I tried giving my own feelings some deep thought.」
[Kashou]: 「Ultimately, I... just want dad to approve of me.」
[Kashou]: 「A little too old to be going through my rebellious teenager phase, I know.」
[Kashou]: 「I'm pretty sure I'm being egotistical and trying to seek approval.」
[Kashou]: 「Sorry, Shigure. Did I shatter your illusion of me...?」
[Shigure]: 「Is that your reason for making pastries, Nii-sama?」
[Kashou]: 「If it wasn't, I wouldn't be this broken up about dad disapproving of me.」
[Shigure]: 「That could very well play a part in it, yes.」
ModelAnswer:
**Kashou:** "I thought it was just about the words, you know?"  
**Shigure:** "No way! To think it was *just* words..."  
**Kashou:** "Well, I really dug deep into my own feelings to understand the true reason in my heart..."  
**Kashou:** "In the end, I guess... I just want Dad to acknowledge me."  
**Kashou:** "Am I having a midlife crisis or something?"  
**Kashou:** "I'm probably just an egoist driven by the need for validation, huh?"  
**Kashou:** "Sorry, Shigure... Did I disappoint you...?"  
**Shigure:** "So, that's why Brother makes Western sweets?"  
**Kashou:** "If not, I wouldn't be this bothered just because Dad rejected it."  
**Shigure:** "Maybe there is some truth to that feeling."

Question:

[Kashou]: 「I couldn't find it in me to comply, so I went to study abroad in France.」
[Shigure]: 「If you just wanted father's approval, then I wouldn't think you'd need to bake cakes to please the girls.」
[Kashou]: 「No, that was just...」
[Shigure]: 「I do think that trying your best for your customer's approval is natural so long as you operate a business.」
[Kashou]: 「Um, yeah...」
[Shigure]: 「But you're not making pastries just to be a rebel. That much I know well.」
[Shigure]: 「The smile on your face when you make the girls happy... What part of that has to do with rebelling against Father?」
ModelAnswer:
**Kashou:** "W-well, that's... true..."
**Kashou:** "But it's undeniable I had mixed feelings about being bossed around so much."
**Kashou:** "I couldn't bring myself to obey willingly, so I went to study in France."
**Shigure:** "If you only wanted Father's approval, I don't think you needed to make cakes to please the cats."
**Kashou:** "No, that's..."
**Shigure:** "Working hard to get customers' recognition is only natural when running a shop, isn't it?"
**Kashou:** "Ugh..."
**Shigure:** "Brother doesn't just make sweets out of spite. I know that very well."
**Shigure:** "The smile on Brother's face when the cats are happy... where do you see any defiance against Father?"

[element] Name: La Soleil (ラ・ソレイユ) | Type: Place
Question:
[嘉祥]: 「ふぅ……けっこう遅くなったな」
[時雨]: 「そうですね。夕食には戻れるかと思っていたのですが」
飛行機の到着がやや遅れ、俺たちは夜になって帰宅した。
まだネコたちが店にいるだろうから、と時雨も水無月家ではなく、俺と一緒にラ・ソレイユへ。
[嘉祥]: 「さすがにこの行脚はキツかったな」
しかも、向こうでは立ち仕事が多かった。
[時雨]: 「私は、ぜんぜん大丈夫です。　お気遣いは無用です、兄様」
気丈に笑みを浮かべるが、疲労の色は隠せない。
[嘉祥]: 「ウチで休んでいくといい。　なんなら泊まって、明日帰ってもいいし」
[時雨]: 「お泊まりですか！？」
reference_answer:
[Kashou]: 「Phew... It sure got late.」
[Shigure]: 「That it did. I thought that we could make it back in time for dinner.」
My plane landed somewhat late, so I end up home around nighttime.
Figuring that the catgirls would be at the shop, Shigure comes with me to La Soleil instead of the Minaduki house.
[Kashou]: 「Yeah, I guess the trek over was asking a lot.」
Plus, we did so much work on our feet overseas.
[Shigure]: 「I'm perfectly fine. You needn't worry about me, Nii-sama.」
Shigure gives a firm smile, but she can't hide her exhaustion.
[Kashou]: 「You can rest up at my house. You can also stay over and go back home tomorrow, if you want.」
[Shigure]: 「Stay over?!」
ModelAnswer:
**Kashou:** "Phew… it's pretty late, isn't it?"  
**Shigure:** "Yes. I was hoping we could make it back for dinner."  

Our flight arrived a bit delayed, so we ended up returning home at night. Since the cats are probably still at La Soleil, Shigure came with me instead of going straight to the Minaduki house.  
**Kashou:** "That trip was pretty rough on me."  
And I did a lot of standing around over there too.  
**Shigure:** "I'm perfectly fine, thank you very much, Brother."  

She forces a smile, but she can't hide her exhaustion.  
**Kashou:** "Why don't you rest at my place? You could even stay overnight and head back tomorrow."  
**Shigure:** "Stay overnight!?"

[嘉祥]: 「ほら、行こう、時雨。　待たせてるんだろう？」
[時雨]: 「はい、兄様！」
[嘉祥]: 「でも、一緒にって話なら、次からはもうすこし早い時間に来てくれよ？」
[嘉祥]: 「暗くなってから１人で出歩くなんて、危ないからな」
[時雨]: 「そうですね……気をつけます、兄様」
reference_answer:
[Coconut]: 「Yup, let's hurry back! Hurry!」
[Azuki]: 「Okay, that's what you say, but you just wanted to walk the Christmas streets with Kashou, didn't ya, Shigure?」
[Shigure]: 「Urk...」
[Shigure]: 「W-Well, when you phrase it that way...」
[Shigure]: 「Granted, if you asked me if walking together would make me happy, then... of course it would!」
[Shigure]: 「I mean... it's a special day, and doing so would...」
[Kashou]: 「Hey, let's go, Shigure. You don't want to make us wait for you, do you?」
[Shigure]: 「Coming, Nii-sama!」
[Kashou]: 「But if you wanted to walk together, try coming here a little earlier next time, all right?」
[Kashou]: 「Walking by yourself after dark can be dangerous, you know.」
[Shigure]: 「Yes, you're right... I'll bear that in mind, Nii-sama.」
ModelAnswer:
**Coconut:** "Yeah, let's go quickly, hurry!"
**Azuki:** "Even though you say that... weren't you really just wanting to walk through the Christmas town with Kashou, Shigure?"
**Shigure:** "Ugh..."
**Shigure:** "Ah, now that you put it like that..."
**Shigure:** "Of course, I wouldn't deny that there's joy in walking together!"
**Shigure:** "But... on such an important day, to do something so..."
**Kashou:** "Come on, Shigure. They're probably waiting for us, right?"
**Shigure:** "Yes, Brother!"
**Kashou:** "But if you want to walk together, try coming a little earlier next time, okay?"
**Kashou:** "It's dangerous walking around alone after dark."
**Shigure:** "You're right... I'll be careful, Brother."

Question:
[メイプル]: 「そういえば、時雨が勝手にフランスに行ったことは、ちゃんと許してもらえたの？」
[時雨]: 「うっ……」
[シナモン]: 「ああ～、置き手紙１つだったから、お母さん怒ってましたよね～？」
[淡雪]: 「そうねー。相談もなしに急に行っちゃうものだから、心配したわー」
[時雨]: 「申し訳ありませんでした……」
[淡雪]: 「でもまぁ、嘉祥が一緒だったみたいだし」
[嘉祥]: 「俺も驚いたけどな」
[淡雪]: 「お土産のフィナンシェが美味しかったから許したわ♪」
母親は怒ると海より深く静かに怒るタイプだが、美味しい食べ物で、だいたい何でも許してくれるのだった。
reference_answer:
[Maple]: 「That reminds me, did he ever forgive you for just up and going to France, Shigure?」
[Shigure]: 「Urk...」
[Cinnamon]: 「Aah~ You only left a letter behind, which made Mom upset, right~?」
[Awayuki]: 「That's right. She just ran off out of the blue without discussing it at all; it worried me sick.」
[Shigure]: 「I apologize for that...」
[Awayuki]: 「Oh well, it seems that you were with Kashou anyway.」
[Kashou]: 「Yeah, which was a surprise to me, too.」
[Awayuki]: 「The financier you gave me as a souvenir was delicious, so you're forgiven♪」
My mother is the type that when she gets angry, her anger is as deep and silent as the ocean. She forgives almost anything if you give her something tasty, though.
ModelAnswer:
[Maple]: "By the way, have you properly apologized for Shigure going to France without permission?"
[Shigure]: "Ugh..."
[Cinnamon]: "Oh yeah~, since it was just a note she left behind, your mom was pretty mad, right~?"
[Awayuki]: "That's right~. She went off without any discussion, so we were worried~"
[Shigure]: "I'm very sorry..."
[Awayuki]: "Well, at least Kashou was with her."
[Kashou]: "I was surprised too."
[Awayuki]: "But she forgave you because the financiers you brought back as souvenirs were delicious♪"
Mother is the type to get quietly angry like the deep sea when she's mad, but she'll forgive almost anything if there's delicious food involved.

reference_answer:

Question:
[時雨]: 「わぁ、クリスマスのプレゼントですか！？ありがとうございます、母様！」
[淡雪]: 「ちょっと早いかもしれないけれど、嘉祥ってば、また怒って帰っちゃうかもしれないでしょう？」
[時雨]: 「うっ……」
[嘉祥]: 「そ、それは今日はないから！　信用してって」
[淡雪]: 「はい、嘉祥にも」
[嘉祥]: 「あ、うん……ありがとう」
[淡雪]: 「開けてみて？」
言われるがままに、包装紙を取って小箱を開けた。
[嘉祥]: 「……写真立て？」
写真は入っていないようだ。
[淡雪]: 「今年の想い出の１枚を部屋に飾ってみたら、楽しいと思うのよ？」
そういえば、母親が欲しがっていたとかで、誕生日に時雨がプレゼントしたのを思い出す。
reference_answer:
[Shigure]: 「Wow, a Christmas present?! Thank you so much, Mother!」
[Awayuki]: 「It might be a bit early, but Kashou just might get all huffy and go back home again.」
[Shigure]: 「Urk...」
[Kashou]: 「Th-That's not happening today! C'mon, believe me!」
[Awayuki]: 「And for you, too, Kashou.」
[Kashou]: 「Oh, yeah... Thanks.」
[Awayuki]: 「Open it.」
I remove the wrapping paper and open the small box as instructed.
[Kashou]: 「...A picture frame?」
It doesn't have a picture in it.
[Awayuki]: 「I think it'd be fun if you'd decorate your rooms with your best memory from this past year.」
That reminds me that my mother wanted a picture frame and Shigure got her one as a birthday present.
ModelAnswer:
**Shigure:** "Wow, is this a Christmas present!? Thank you, Mother!"
**Awayuki:** "It might be a little early, but Kashou might get angry and go home again, right?"
**Shigure:** "Ugh..."
**Kashou:** "T-that's not happening today! Trust me."
**Awayuki:** "Here, for Kashou too."
**Kashou:** "Ah, yeah... thanks."
**Awayuki:** "Why don't you open it?"
As told, he took off the wrapping paper and opened the small box.
**Kashou:** "...A photo frame?"
It doesn't seem to have a picture inside.
**Awayuki:** "I thought it would be fun to display one of this year's memories in your room, don't you think?"
Come to think of it, I remember Shigure giving it as a birthday present because Mother wanted it.
